programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Industrial Age
programme.desc: The former steeplejack sets out on an enthusiastic tour of Britains industrial heritage, exploring the early use of wind and water power and visiting some steam engines still in use today. On his travels Fred meets a man who has built a windmill in his back garden and hunts for examples of early beam engines that are still functioning today

programme.title: Railways: The Making of a Nation
programme.desc: Liz McIvor explores how Britains expanding rail network was the spark to a social revolution, starting in the 1800s and continuing through to modern times. She begins by examining the introduction of precise railway schedules and timetables that recognised Greenwich Mean Time. However, in a country made up of separate local time zones, with clocks in the west set several minutes behind those in the east, not everyone was keen to step in line

programme.title: Britains Lost Masterpieces
programme.desc: Social historian Emma Dabiri and Dr Bendor Grosvenor travel to Glasgow to investigate a long-lost picture of George Villiers, Duke of Buckingham, who was the lover of James VI of Scotland, possibly painted by one of the most famous artists in history

programme.title: Call My Bluff
programme.desc: Robert Robinson oversees another duel of words and wit as Frank Muir, Sue Cook and Bryan Forbes take on Arthur Marshall, Nanette Newman and Paul Eddington. First broadcast in 1981

programme.title: Face the Music
programme.desc: Joseph Cooper invites viewers to match their musical wits against panellists Arianna Stassinopoulos, Richard Baker and David Attenborough. With guest musician Erich Leinsdorf. First broadcast in 1975

programme.title: Arena
programme.sub-title: The Orson Welles Story: Arena - Part One
programme.desc: Part one of two. A profile of the director, actor and writer, including an interview in which he reflects on his long career in the film industry from the success of Citizen Kane up to his work on Touch of Evil. Featuring contributions by Jeanne Moreau, John Huston, Peter Bogdanovich, Robert Wise and Charlton Heston

programme.title: Arena
programme.sub-title: The Orson Welles Story: Arena - Part Two
programme.desc: In the second of two documentaries about the directors life and work, Welles discusses more of his films, including The Trial, Chimes at Midnight, The Immortal Story and F for Fake. He also talks about his unfinished projects - The Other Side of the Wind and Don Quixote. Alan Yentobs interview with Welles is interspersed with the thoughts of other cinematic luminaries, including John Huston, Jeanne Moreau, Peter Bogdanovich and Anthony Perkins

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Industrial Age
programme.desc: The former steeplejack sets out on an enthusiastic tour of Britains industrial heritage, exploring the early use of wind and water power and visiting some steam engines still in use today. On his travels Fred meets a man who has built a windmill in his back garden and hunts for examples of early beam engines that are still functioning today

programme.title: Railways: The Making of a Nation
programme.desc: Liz McIvor explores how Britains expanding rail network was the spark to a social revolution, starting in the 1800s and continuing through to modern times. She begins by examining the introduction of precise railway schedules and timetables that recognised Greenwich Mean Time. However, in a country made up of separate local time zones, with clocks in the west set several minutes behind those in the east, not everyone was keen to step in line

programme.title: Face the Music
programme.desc: Joseph Cooper invites viewers to match their musical wits against panellists Arianna Stassinopoulos, Richard Baker and David Attenborough. With guest musician Erich Leinsdorf. First broadcast in 1975

programme.title: Oak Tree: Natures Greatest Survivor
programme.desc: George McGavin explores one of the great icons of the British countryside - the oak tree. Studying a 400-year-old tree throughout the different seasons of the year, George investigates its surprisingly sophisticated biology, how it adapts to its ever-changing environment and why it has become such an important part of the countryside

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Industrial Age
programme.desc: An exploration of the textile mills and factories that once thrived in Britain during the Industrial Revolution. From New Lanark in Scotland to the mill town of Burnley, Fred meets ex-workers to discover what life was really like, and chats to a group that has dedicated 30 years to restoring mill engines

programme.title: Railways: The Making of a Nation
programme.desc: Liz McIvor examines how the railways stimulated great changes to the nations economy, and encouraged a new generation of mechanical engineers, skilled workers, managers and accountants. Originally, local entrepreneurs viewed trains as vehicles for shifting raw materials, stock and goods, however it soon became clear that there was money to be made in transporting people

programme.title: The Two Ronnies Sketchbook
programme.desc: Messrs Corbett and Barker reminisce about some of the best moments from their career, including the classic Fork Handles sketch, and theres a final chance to catch up with the work of the Phantom Raspberry Blower. Katie Melua provides an interlude to the comic mayhem with a performance of Crawling Up a Hill. From April 2005

programme.title: Porridge
programme.desc: Harris accidentally drops stolen pills into Fletchers midday cuppa - much to the annoyance of prison racketeer Harry Grout, who resents a newcomer muscling in on his patch. Classic comedy, starring Ronnie Barker. First broadcast in 1977

programme.title: The Many Faces of
programme.sub-title: The Many Faces of Ronnie Barker
programme.desc: The story of a quiet, dedicated man who might have been a bank manager, but went on to become one of the nations most popular comedy stars. Ben Elton, Michael Grade, David Renwick and Josephine Tewson are among friends and colleagues who remember his partnership with Ronnie Corbett in sketch show The Two Ronnies, as skinflint grocer Arkwright in Open All Hours and crafty prisoner Fletch in Porridge. There is also a look at his prolific writing career and his work as an actor in serious roles

programme.title: Storyville
programme.desc: Documentary following the family of Liat Beinin Atzili as they try to secure her release after she was kidnapped by Hamas during the October 7 attack on Israel in 2023 and held hostage. Her father Yehuda initially travels to the US to take part in a campaign for the hostages release, as Liat is a dual American-Israeli citizen, but his desire to advocate for peace and reconciliation quickly puts himself at odds with political forces he encounters

programme.title: Success Story: Gore Vidal
programme.desc: Gore Vidal, the enfant terrible of American letters, then living in some splendour in Italy, talks about the ironies of succeeding in a world that he delights in attacking. First broadcast 6 August 1975

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Industrial Age
programme.desc: An exploration of the textile mills and factories that once thrived in Britain during the Industrial Revolution. From New Lanark in Scotland to the mill town of Burnley, Fred meets ex-workers to discover what life was really like, and chats to a group that has dedicated 30 years to restoring mill engines

programme.title: Railways: The Making of a Nation
programme.desc: Liz McIvor examines how the railways stimulated great changes to the nations economy, and encouraged a new generation of mechanical engineers, skilled workers, managers and accountants. Originally, local entrepreneurs viewed trains as vehicles for shifting raw materials, stock and goods, however it soon became clear that there was money to be made in transporting people

programme.title: Britains Lost Masterpieces
programme.desc: British art detectives Bendor Grosvenor and Emma Dabiri hunt for of the nations great lost masterpieces. They uncover if a painting of a society woman is by artist Joshua Reynolds and discover which celebrity playwright will lead them from Rome to Bath to Londons Royal Academy

programme.title: Genius of the Ancient World
programme.desc: Bettany Hughes series exploring the lives and teachings of influential ancient philosophers draws to a close with a profile of Confucius, who is credited as the first Chinese thinker to take a systematic philosophical approach to issues of social, political and ethical importance. Born during the chaotic Spring and Autumn period of Chinese history, Confucius believed that harmony could be promoted and achieved through the examples of sage rulers. He was also a innovative teacher, and tried to instill his principles of moral excellence in Chinas elite, but died without seeing his vision for his nation come to pass. However, his philosophies would eventually form the bedrock of Chinese culture, with many of his principles of tradition surviving to this day

Alan purchases a dilapidated 17th-century house with a medieval watchtower in the rural hamlet of Fornovolasco, and ropes in Amanda to spend their summer transforming it into another Italian dream home. However, arriving at the property for the first time, they discover its been left empty since the previous owner died and a massive restoration job lies ahead

programme.desc: Izzie Balmer and JJ Chalmers help a couple who need to repair and redecorate their Chingford home. A small box uncovers a treasure trove of jewellery, exciting auctioneer Izzie, and commemorative coins will also appeal to keen collectors at the auction. Restoration expert JJ converts his mobile workshop into a dog-grooming parlour, where he restores a womans childhood toy dog to its former glory

programme.title: Restoration Rescue
programme.desc: Architect Patrick Bradley meets a couple in Londonderry who are on a mission to restore a Georgian estate with a fascinating history, and turn it into their new family home. After decades of decline, its one of the most daunting restoration projects Patricks ever encountered and, when work finally gets going, its not long before the challenges start mounting up, as they find out much of the original timbers holding the house together are riddled with woodworm and wet rot

programme.title: Panorama

programme.title: Stitched Up? Surgery in the Sun
programme.desc: Cosmetic surgery abroad promises transformation at a bargain, but behind the filters and hashtags, the risks are all too real. Journalist Aoife Moore gets under the skin of the multi-billion-pound medical tourism industry. She begins by talking to her cousin Sean, who travelled to Turkey four years ago for gastric sleeve surgery. In Lurgan, County Armagh, Aoife meets online influencer Chloe, who is about to head to Istanbul to have a boob job

A year later, their living room is still a dumping ground, and the kitchen is chaotic. From a playful coffee table to ingenious kitchen storage, the team brings joy, style and order back to the home

programme.title: Amanda and Alans Italian Job
programme.desc: Amanda Holden and Alan Carr take on their first project - transforming the old dining room into a Tuscan living room. After failing to reach an agreement on the colour scheme, the duo discover the windows of their 17th-century home are unsalvageable and must be made from scratch. Luckily another old feature can be saved, and with the help of Scott the DIY duo restore the original chestnut ceiling beams. Away from the work, the pair venture out into the Apuan Alps and face their fears - taking flight with a 1,500m long zip wire over the spectacular Lake Vagli

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Jules Hudson explores the countryside of North and West Yorkshire with a couple from a market town in West Sussex. Jules has a superb selection of properties to show them, and key to their wish list is a big workshop where its hoped a woodworking hobby will become a profession

programme.title: The Travelling Auctioneers
programme.sub-title: Can Dads Old Coins Fund My Wedding?
programme.desc: Auctioneer James Broad and restorer Lauren Wood scour a Birmingham home, unearthing global treasures and reviving worn pieces to make them auction-ready. By selling items owned by her late parents, owner Ana hopes to write a new chapter in her life, including planning a romantic cruise ship wedding to her partner Michael. Chinese vases, Scottish whisky and an Egyptian revival chest are all marked for auction by JB, a large wooden chest requires Laurens attention and her unorthodox method of using grit and teabags produces a surprising outcome

programme.desc: An episode focusing on the life and career of French military leader and ruler Napoleon Bonaparte, following his rise from humble beginnings to being crowned emperor of France. programme.title: Top Gear

programme.title: Stranded on Honeymoon Island: Australia
programme.desc: The six couples hit day five of this crazy dating adventure and face gale force winds. A shower promises romance, while the first group gathering at Couples Cove serves up more controversy and drama than ever expected

programme.title: Bad Influencer: The Great Insta Con
programme.desc: The rise and fall of internet wellness guru Belle Gibson, who cultivated an adoring online following with the story that she had successfully treated her own cancer by eating a plant-based diet and using alternative natural therapies. There was one major problem with Belles story - she never had cancer

programme.title: Juice
programme.desc: Guy doesnt want to see Jamma anymore, so when Jamma meets a magical stranger who offers to unburden him from his clownish ways to win Guy back, he decides to take the deal and is transformed. Guy has a photo shoot for his book cover, but doesnt want to look boring, so Isaac offers to style him in exchange for free therapy. Comedy, co-written by and starring Mawaan Rizwan, with Russell Tovey

programme.title: Juice
programme.desc: The new Jamma is reliable and consistent - he wants to respect Guys boundaries, but also needs Saifs address from Guy so he can try to reconnect with his father. Winnies dad is visiting for some quality father-daughter bonding, but shes not yet come out as straight to him and asks Isaac to play along. Comedy, starring Mawaan Rizwan, Russell Tovey and Emily Lloyd-Saini

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: The three hosts are each given a budget of £5,000 to find a car that can hold its own on a racetrack and handle everyday tasks, before testing their purchases in Germany. James May puts two Porsches through their paces on the Top Gear test circuit, and former Downing Street communications director Alastair Campbell tries out the Reasonably Priced Car

programme.title: Bad Influencer: The Great Insta Con

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.sub-title: Horrible Histories: Horrid Henry VIII Special
programme.desc: Rowan Atkinson stars in an episode focusing on the life of the English monarch, including his struggles with his boring dad Henry VII, before becoming king himself, and going through wives like most people go through toothbrushes. Plus, stories about Ottoman leader Suleiman the Magnificent in Turkey and Emperor Zhengde in China

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Kathryn Drysdale stars in an episode focusing on the life of the Egyptian queen Cleopatra, meeting her as she clashes with her brother, seizes power and hooks up with Roman leaders Julius Caesar and Mark Antony. Plus, the thoughts of famous Chinese philosopher Confucius, and the less glamorous side of life in Rome

programme.title: The Catch Up
programme.desc: A round-up of the days news

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: The presenters search for the worlds best four-seat supercar, pitting the Aston Martin Rapide against the Porsche Panamera Turbo and Maserati Quattroporte in a series of unusual challenges in the south of England. Harry Potter star Rupert Grint and ex-Formula One driver Rubens Barrichello each do a lap in the Reasonably Priced Car and Richard Hammond puts the Chevrolet Camaro SS and Mercedes E63 AMG through their paces on the test track

programme.title: Missing in Paradise: Searching for Sarm
programme.desc: Journalist Tir Dhondy investigates the disappearance of Sarm Heslop, who went missing from a luxury Caribbean charter yacht in 2021. Tire retraces Sarms last known movements and tracks down two boat captains whose vessels were moored near the yacht she vanished from. Also, she gets to question Ryan Banes, Sarms boyfriend, account of what happened what happened through his lawyer David Cattie

programme.title: Missing in Paradise: Searching for Sarm
programme.desc: Tir Dhondy meets with island police and is given CCTV footage that has never been released, showing Sarms last known movements with her boyfriend, Ryan Bane

programme.title: Missing in Paradise: Searching for Sarm
programme.desc: Tir Dhondy searches for the yacht Sarm vanished from, and tracks down Ryan Banes ex-wife, hearing first-hand about her experiences while married to him

programme.title: People Just Do Nothing: Big in Japan
programme.desc: After Brentfords largest pirate radio station has ended, the boys from Kurupt FM find their way to Japan on an epic adventure in search of fame and fortune. But is Japan really ready for Kurupt FM? Comedy based on the BBC series, starring Allan Mustafa, Steve Stamp and Asim Chaudhry

programme.title: RuPauls Drag Race UK
programme.desc: The nervous energy is palpable as 12 brand new queens enter the werk room to meet their fellow competitors and judge supremo RuPaul for the very first time. In this race, nothing is predictable, and in their very first challenge, Ru has an extra-special challenge in store for the queens. In a Drag Race UK first, the queens display show-stopping looks as they attend the biggest night in fashion - the star-studded Brit Gala. Comedian and presenter Joel Dommett guests on the judging panel, alongside Michelle Visage and Alan Carr

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.sub-title: Good Vibrations/Puffs Perfect Picnic/Run, Mushpie, Run/Watch the Storm
programme.desc: Lilit is under pressure. Truff, the most talented musician in Mushton, has invited her, Mush-Mush and Chep to form a band with him. / Because he has won the moss-ball game last year, Puff is in charge of organizing this Summer’s Picnic. Only Puff isn’t comfortable in that role. / Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit notice that Mushpie seems in great shape lately. They want to feel as great as she does and try to discover her secret. / When Chep asks Mush-Mush and Lilit to go storm-watching and they refuse, Lilit feels bad and convinces Mush-Mush to join their friend.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.sub-title: The Breathtaking Bolly Show/Work Like a Charm/Star Helpers/The Rollinator
programme.desc: If Mush-Mush had Bolly’s speed, he’d want everyone to see just how awesomely fast he was. / Chep becomes obsessed with learning all about Mushlore – all the funny little traditions and things that Mushables believe in. / Starmush’s back is stuck, and the Mushelder has no choice but to ask for help in Mushton. / Chep is so good at moss-marbles, no one wants to play him anymore! No one except Sumush who reveals himself to be a tough competitor.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.sub-title: Stuck In The Mud/Get The Egg Home/Fly, Chase, Fly/Oh My Compost
programme.desc: When Fung and Miff spoil Mush-Mush’s fun tunnel surprise he has been working on for ages, he wishes their day was ruined too. / When an egg blows down into the village, it is Mush-Mush and friends’ mission to return it to Mush Mountain. / Chep is disappointed Mush-Mush and Lilit are too busy leaf-gliding to play moss-ball with him, so he hangs out with a new weevil friend instead. / When Sushi-Mushi breaks the only spoon he has ever cooked with, he declares his cooking days are over!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.sub-title: Mush-Mush The Predictor/Whos Eating Mushton/The Breathtaking Bolly Show/Work Like a Charm/Star Helpers/The Rollinator
programme.desc: Mush-Mush can’t figure out why his sense foot keeps buzzing like crazy… until an earthquake shakes the forest. Mush-Mush is sure he predicted it! / Everyone in Mushton is finding that their precious wooden things are being munched and destroyed by someone or something. / If Mush-Mush had Bolly’s speed, he’d want everyone to see just how awesomely fast he was. / Chep becomes obsessed with learning all about Mushlore – all the funny little traditions and things that Mushables believe in. / Starmush’s back is stuck, and the Mushelder has no choice but to ask for help in Mushton. / Chep is so good at moss-marbles, no one wants to play him anymore! No one except Sumush who reveals himself to be a tough competitor.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: ...Charm/Bears Best Friend/Super Grizzy Bros/Fake Brothers/Mind in a Whirl/A Sizeable Problem => Grizzy wants to offer his beloved she-bear some flowers. / This is not Grizzys day… But his luck is about to change. / Grizzy can’t believe his eyes when he sees objects moving all by themselves. He soon realises it’s the Lemmings who are playing around with a magnet. / Grizzy thinks his beloved she-bear has turned into a frog. / Grizzy discovers a baby raccoon not far from the log cabin. When he sees its big moist eyes Grizzy melts and adopts the creature. / Grizzy discovers video games on the ranger’s console. / Grizzy builds a look-alike robot to keep the Lemmings away. / When she is accidentally hit over the head the she-bear Grizzys in love with thinks shes a Lemming. / A meteorite falls near the log cabin.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.sub-title: Watch the Storm/Lightning Bark/Special Delivery/The Perfect Fritter/My Muddy Buddy
programme.desc: When Chep asks Mush-Mush and Lilit to go storm-watching and they refuse, Lilit feels bad and convinces Mush-Mush to join their friend. / Fung and Miff have come across a rare piece of bark struck by lightning. / Chep knows so many things about nature that Mush-Mush and Lilit are confident he’s not far from being an expert like Mushpot. / Sushi-Mushi tests new compost fritters recipes. When Mush-Mush gets to taste one, he can’t believe it: Sushi-Mushi has cooked the perfect fritter. / When Lilit creates a ‘friends tree’ mapping out who everyone is best friends with in Mushton, she realizes Muddler has no friends at all.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.sub-title: What a Stinker/The Art of Friendship/The Rollinator/Star Helpers
programme.desc: Chep is very excited: tonight, a rare and extremely stinky plant is going to bloom! But he already promised Mush-Mush to play their favourite game. / When Chanterelle sees how good Lilit is at painting, she offers to help her dig into her talent. / Chep is so good at moss-marbles, no one wants to play him anymore! No one except Sumush who reveals himself to be a tough competitor. / Starmush’s back is stuck, and the Mushelder has no choice but to ask for help in Mushton.

programme.title: Moley
programme.sub-title: Molerskating Mayhem/Duck Moley Duck!/Squirm’s Day Out/Three Gentlemen of Moletown/Who Arted
programme.desc: Moley must learn to Molerskate for the Great Mole Roll skating competition and discovers his parents have a hidden talent. / When an egg rolls into Moletown and a duckling hatches, Moley must play momma to the baby duck until they can find its home. / When Moley helps take care of the worms at Dotty’s Adopt a Worm Rescue Center, the Gardener sends Squirm to pose as a homeless worm and help him steal Manny. / When Moley’s Keeper duties are pulling him in too many directions, he gets Manny to create multiple Moleys! / When Dotty joins an art competition Moley is afraid her art won’t appeal to the snooty judge so he casts a spell that causes her art to come to life!

programme.title: Love Monster
programme.desc: Everyone in Fluffytown is gathered for a communal nap ahead of the big Siesta Fiesta Day celebration - because the better the nap, the better the party afterwards. Elder Chick demonstrates the Fluffytown nap timer and explains when she presses the button its time to snooze, and when the hand reaches the balloon, its time for the Siesta Fiesta. She starts the timer, and everyone hurries off to their nap stations to begin their naps. As the other Fluffytowners start to doze off, Love Monster struggles to fall asleep. After trying a pre-nap workout with Tiniest Fluffiest Bunny, practising yoga with Book Cub and pillow drumming with Bad Idea Puppy, a frustrated Love Monster gives up and thinks he might as well start getting ready for the party. He heads over to his decks and puts on a song just before the sleep timer goes off, and everyone awakes full of energy. As everyone boogies to the beats, Tiniest Fluffiest Bunny looks over to the decks, but Love Monster is nowhere to be seen. She goes around the back of the decks and finds him curled up underneath them, finally fast asleep. Sometimes, when you give up the struggle, you find the snuggle.

She and her owner, Katrina, visit all sorts of people every day, young and old. Today Sylvie and Katrina are visiting a doctors surgery to help a little boy called Ben. Ben has fallen off his scooter and grazed his knee, and his mum says hes too nervous to come into the doctors room. Sylvies mission is to help Ben feel brave enough to see Dr Stevens. First, she gives Ben one of her biggest and best cuddles. Then, she and Dr Stevens show Ben how a doctor treats a patient. Sylvie loves performing in the starring role. Its Makeover Day, and they want to make over Elder Kittens living room while he gets a relaxing makeover himself at the Fluffytown spa. When they finish, Love Monster thinks its very different from Elder Kittens usual style. He starts to wonder whether Elder Kitten will be good surprised or bad surprised. Just then, Elder Kitten returns from his spa day. Bad Idea Puppy and Tiniest Fluffiest Bunny show him his new living room and explain that they decorated with the best bright things they could think of. As Elder Kitten looks on a little unsure, Love Monster asks him whether he loves it. Elder Kitten is a little lost for words and, not wanting to hurt their feelings, he simply agrees with them that its bright and very different. Love Monster can tell that Elder Kitten doesnt like it, and eventually Elder Kitten gently admits that its not really his style. The friends realise that they got so excited that they just did the makeover how they would like it but not how Elder Kitten would like it. They apologise, but Elder Kitten says its okay and gives them a hug. Tiniest Fluffiest Bunny asks how they can make it up to him, and Elder Kitten suggests that they make over their makeover in his favourite paint colour. As they get to work, Elder Kitten spots one of their paw prints in paint on the floor covers and has an idea. Later, the room is decorated but with a border of colourful paw prints around the middle. Now hell always think of his favourite bright things even when theyre not there. Sometimes, the brightest surprises are best when you think of your friends.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Colin Murray and Rachel Riley host the long-running words-and-numbers game, with Mark Radcliffe joining Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner

programme.desc: Mark, from Kent, has a lifelong love of Italy. Having recently retired, hes set his sights on finding a holiday bolthole in its Puglia region to escape to at various times of the year. With best friend John also on hand to lend his support, Mark would love to find a three-bedroom townhouse. Property expert Laura Hamilton also helps him deliver his dream on an £80,000 budget

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village
programme.desc: John and Tara have bought a Portuguese quinta and are about to get stuck in. In France, Liz and Dave battle with leaky pipes at Lac de Maison. And in central Italy, Cesidio prepares to welcome his daughter Sofia and her family from Scotland, continuing a historical cycle that began with his grandfathers emigration

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The BandBers head to Tideswell in the Peak District for the weeks first visit, where brothers Richard and Mick host at their pub The George Inn. Everyone explores each others hidden depths during an afternoon in a cave, and one pair of hosts impress everyone else when they reveal their wealth of experience. Unfortunately, Richard and Mick are less impressed by some cleanliness scores that they just cant brush off

programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc: The Garners and the Rodriguezes revisit previous clients to discover how their property purchases and lives have been transformed since moving to Spain. In the Costa Blanca, in the province of Alicante, sisters Sophie and Charlotte Rodriguez catch up with ex-Army duo Kevin and Linda who, back in 2019, arrived with polar opposite property wishes. Fast forward two years and the sisters are back to find out if the couple are now marching to the same beat and living their shared dream. In Almería, Sharon and Steve Garner catch up with former client Mary, who left Irelands Co Kildare after she bagged a bargain abode for 25,000 euros under its asking price

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather

Plus, Poppy Cooks, the self-proclaimed queen of potatoes, demonstrates a couple of her favourite potato dishes

programme.title: Lucy Letby: Murder or Mistake
programme.desc: Part one of two. Documentary covering the infamous murder case, following the turbulent months after the conviction and a high-profile campaign to sway public opinion. For the first time, one affected family break their silence about their experience with Letby and their newborn. As tensions rise, families accuse Letbys defence of turning tragedy into spectacle

Nahum and Dean arrive by ambulance following a road traffic accident, and 94-year-old Pearl comes in after badly cutting her arm by trapping it in a lift

programme.title: Educating Yorkshire

Ania Magliano is unsure of the difference between snakes and worms, Sanjeev Bhaskar creates a disturbing tableau and Reece Shearsmith gets quite angry with a large yellow cube. Taskmaster Greg Davies issues the points, though assistant Alex Horne very often agrees with his decisions

programme.desc: A novel take on the US presidents second term in office, recutting archive news clips as drama to retell his story. Donald tackles the worlds biggest problems. He sets out an unlikely foreign policy agenda and is forced to make some big decisions about which wars to get involved in, and whose side hes on. Trumps loose strategy keeps everyone guessing - with no one knowing what will happen

programme.desc: Aspiring model Ryan is hoping that his French and Caribbean cuisine will tantalise his guests tastebuds in Leeds. Desperate to lighten the mood, he hosts a modelling masterclass, but his controversial views on beauty backfire. programme.title: Taylor
programme.desc: Two-part documentary examining Taylor Swifts rise to fame, from country music prodigy to pop phenomenon. Starting from the beginning of her career, teenage Taylor emerges as a country prodigy and slowly gains fame until the moment Kanye West interrupts her speech at an award ceremony, propelling the young country starlet to a different order of global fame. The underdog is born. Her response to adversity is to write a song about it, take control of the narrative and bounce back. But just as Taylor is on the verge of going even more stratospheric, shes hit by an online cancellation that surely exceeds even her powers of reinvention. How will she bounce back from this?

programme.title: Taylor
programme.desc: After being cancelled and going dark on social media, Taylor Swift re-emerges, defiant and determined to reclaim and rewrite her story in a whole new era. No longer the people-pleaser of her youth, this Taylor isnt afraid of criticism. She puts her head above the parapet, standing up to the music industry and critics, and speaking out about politics and contemporary issues

programme.desc: The documentary returns to follow Northamptonshire police once again. A rush-hour crash sees a wrecked van left abandoned and wedged on top of railings at a pedestrian crossing, and Lloyd and Harrison spend the night shift catching up with a drink-driver in Kettering

programme.desc: Crime documentary following homicide detectives at work as a series of horrific and violent murder investigations unfold, beginning with a savage axe attack on a woman in a shopping precinct in broad daylight. programme.desc: A man who is refused entry to a nightclub takes exception when a specialist operations officer tries to send him on his way, pushing both the police and the clubs bouncers. The police seemed to think he had been expecting them - but did he know where Tina and the others were?

programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on April 2021 shows including Line of Duty, Snackmasters, Alan Carrs Epic Gameshow, Mastermind, Baby Surgeons: Delivering Miracles, The Art of the Joy of Sex and Dr Pimple Popper. They also observe BBC news coverage of the apparent spat between Dominic Cummings and Boris Johnson

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: As the newlyweds return from their honeymoons, all nine couples move in together and adjust to life in their marital homes, ahead of the first dinner party

programme.title: Made in Chelsea
programme.desc: Jack is still reeling from his break-up with Livvy, who seems to be moving on with her so-called friendship with Kit, and he sets out to confront the pair. When Jazz makes clear her own feelings about Livvys disrespectful behaviour, Livvy isnt impressed - and sparks fly. Armans back from Thailand, and Tabitha wastes no time in messaging him to arrange to meet. Jazz confides in Jules about feeling uncomfortable in her own skin. Shes keen to explore her identity, but fearful of opening up to Demi and jeopardising their relationship. Beks and Ollys Thailand fling left Freddy adamant that Beks was doing it to get revenge

programme.title: Below Deck
programme.desc: Sunny is upset by Bens wandering eyes and fears that she might get hurt again and theres major drama when new guests are royally demanding. When Fraser reaches breaking point with Barbie, he asks Captain Kerry to make a crew change

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer becomes a doting father and decides to spend quality time with his youngest daughter when he discovers Santas Little Helper knows Maggie better than he does. Meanwhile, a lonely Moe joins an online dating agency, and gets a pleasant surprise when he meets an attractive woman

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon becomes concerned that his comfortable lifestyle is having an impact on his professional progress and is stopping him from achieving scientific greatness, so he asks the gang to make life more difficult for him. Meanwhile, Howard invents an unflattering game about Raj. Starring Jim Parsons and Simon Helberg

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard and Sheldon are forced to defend themselves against criticism from an online bully after publishing a physics paper. Meanwhile, the girls confront embarrassing moments from their pasts during a night in. Comedy, guest starring Stephen Hawking, with Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: A simple texting error threatens everything when Manny and Luke put on a fancy winter ball at the school, Mitchell gets a wake-up call when he offers to help, while Jays thinly veiled attempt to get out of it by pretending to want to spend time with Phil backfires. Vanessa Bayer guests stars as an overbearing mother

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Pop-Pop shocks everyone by offering to pay for a family cruise. And during her first Hanukkah with the Schwartzes, Erica realises that they are not as perfect as they seem

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Tonys case suffers a shocking blow, Clare celebrates when Donny delivers some news, and two residents find comfort in one another

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Haunted by questions, John Paul digs into what really happened on the night when Bobby died. Clare wont stop until she gets her money back, and secrets continue to tear a family apart

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads for West Babylon, New York, to help the inexperienced owners of restaurant Classic American deal with their escalating debts. The chef struggles to cope with disorganised staff and an unappealing menu, but quickly realises the real problem lies in the kitchen, where a lack of leadership and communication is causing serious trouble

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: As the newlyweds return from their honeymoons, all nine couples move in together and adjust to life in their marital homes, ahead of the first dinner party

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube
programme.desc: Comedy clips showcasing amusing internet videos featuring sheep

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: The Good, the Sad and the Drugly
programme.desc: Bart is on his best behaviour as he tries to win the affections of a girl at his school, while Lisa reports on what Springfield will look like in 50 years. With the voice of Anne Hathaway (Les Miserables)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The guys become stranded in the middle of nowhere when Leonards car is stolen en route to the Bakersfield comic-book convention. Meanwhile, back at home, the women try to work out why the guys are so fascinated with such publications

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is furious when the university forces him to work with Kripke, while Howards hobby lands him in financial trouble. However, that doesnt stop him and Raj getting expensive action figures of themselves made - much to Bernadettes disapproval

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Cameron is delighted when his mother comes to visit, but her presence makes Mitchell feel uncomfortable. Meanwhile, Haleys decision to break up with Dylan hits Phil hard. Guest starring Celia Weston, with Eric Stonestreet and Jesse Tyler Ferguson

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Luke and Manny prepare for their first school dance, but the rest of the family seems more excited by the occasion. Meanwhile, Mitch and Cameron worry when Lily begins biting other children in the playground. Comedy, starring Ed ONeill and Julie Bowen

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Raj is racked with guilt when he tries to date Lucy and Emily at the same time, Penny has trouble deciding whether to take a role in a film, and Sheldon struggles to choose between two gaming systems. Comedy, starring Kunal Nayyar, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny tries to help Sheldon when he starts to wonder whether he is wasting his time studying string theory. Meanwhile, during a dinner, Raj discovers Howard once embarrassed himself on a date with Emily. Stephen Hawking guest stars

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny and Leonard try to distract Sheldon from his career woes by reinstating Anything Can Happen Thursday, but it causes friction among the gang when Amy and Bernadette are caught lying. Meanwhile, Raj seeks Howards help in preparing for a date with Emily. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The gangs preparations for Star Wars Day are interrupted by the news that Professor Proton has died. Leonard and Penny attend the funeral, where they talk about their rejected marriage proposals, but Sheldon has difficulty dealing with the death of his childhood hero - until a surprise visitor helps him cope with his grief. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco, with a guest appearance by Bob Newhart

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Now that hes officially back at the precinct and desperate to solve a real criminal case, Peralta finds a loophole to get out of his temporarily designated desk duty. Unfortunately, that loophole rests on his ability to pass an official evaluation performed by Captain Holt. While Boyle provides Peralta with moral support, Jeffords and Santiago help Diaz, who believes Pimento may be cheating on her

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: The precinct embarks on its fifth annual Halloween Heist and, as usual, everybody has a plan and no one is safe. Relationships and friendships are tested in the competition to win a spectacular championship belt and the title Amazing Human Slash Genius by midnight, leaving all the members of the squad pitted against one another

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Lisa begins a whirlwind romance with her intellectual match, much to Marges chagrin. Meanwhile, Bart and Milhouse take inspiration from their favourite TV show and set out to debunk Springfield Elementarys most famous legends. With the voices of Jamie Hyneman and Adam Savage (hosts of Mythbusters) and Michael Cera (Scott Pilgrim vs the World)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The long-running animation reaches its 500th episode. Homer and his family are forced to leave town and live as outcasts after angering the people of Springfield one too many times. Helping them adjust to their new life is WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange, while the cartoons theme is given a makeover by singer Alison Krauss

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: As the newlyweds return from their honeymoons, all nine couples move in together and adjust to life in their marital homes, ahead of the first dinner party

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Penny agree to participate in an unusual experiment, and Leonard, Amy, Raj and Emily spend the evening trying to escape from a zombie. Elsewhere, Howard and Bernadette run into trouble at the airport after returning from Mrs Wolowitzs funeral. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart takes pity on Mrs Krabappel and nominates her for the prestigious Teacher of the Year competition held in Florida, making Principal Skinner fear she will find another job if she wins. With the guest voice of Little Richard

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: The Dad Who Knew Too Little
programme.desc: Homer realises he knows very little about Lisa and tries to fill the gaps in his knowledge by hiring a dodgy private detective to spy on her - only to end up on the wrong side of the law. With the guest voice of Elliott Gould

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Tonys plea hearing takes shocking twists and turns, while Dodger comes across some damning evidence. And Vicky wants to know what really happened to Robbie

programme.title: Hollyoaks At 30: Most Explosive Episodes
programme.desc: A look back at a classic episode of Hollyoaks ahead of the soaps 30th anniversary. In the aftermath of the devastating accident, Hollyoaks falls into disrepair. Things are put into perspective for many in the village, but how much longer can the truth stay buried?

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Truck driver Beth is fed up with riding solo. Her date is freelance pilot Aristos, who rarely encounters women in his day-to-day life. Theodora ended her marriage of 46 years and is now searching for romance. She meets widower Simon, who promised his wife he would find love again after she died. Last up is 27-year-old joiner Connor, whos keen to prove hes not just after a good time but is ready for something serious. Connor and cruise ship performer Stephanie have an almost instant chemistry

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: The inaugural Commitment Ceremony sees all nine couples meet the experts for the first time. For some, its an opportunity to showcase their success, but two couples clash

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Anna Richardson welcomes the oldest ever picker to the studio, 75-year-old naturist Ian from North Yorkshire. Ian has recently been exploring his sexuality and needs help to find his perfect partner. Next up is 30-year-old waitress Kerry from Aberdeen, who finds the smell of mens armpits gets her hot under the collar and wants a man with a sweet scent who can also get experimental in the bedroom

programme.title: First Dates

programme.title: The Swimmer
programme.desc: A world-weary man embarks on a unique odyssey of self-discovery, attempting to reach home by diving into and swimming in the neighbourhood pools along his route. Director Frank Perrys cult drama, starring Burt Lancaster, Kim Hunter and Janice Rule

programme.title: The Man from Colorado
programme.desc: An American Civil War veteran, twisted by his experiences during the conflict, becomes the judge of a small town. He embarks on a reign of terror, ruthlessly misusing his power, and it falls to an old friend from his army days to bring him down. Western, starring Glenn Ford, William Holden, Ellen Drew and Ray Collins

programme.title: Gift Horse
programme.desc: A Navy captain reluctantly takes command of an old US destroyer during the Second World War and struggles with a crew who do not respect his authority. However, the prospect of facing the mighty German force brings much-needed unity. Adventure, starring Trevor Howard, Richard Attenborough, Bernard Lee, Sonny Tufts and James Donald

programme.title: The Desert Fox
programme.desc: German commander Rommel falls out of favour with Hitler following his defeat at El Alamein. On returning to his homeland, he is torn between his oath of loyalty and lack of faith in the Fuehrers unstable leadership, prompting him to become involved in an assassination plot. Second World War drama, starring James Mason, Jessica Tandy, Cedric Hardwicke, Leo G Carroll and Luther Adler

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence
programme.desc: Two decades have passed since Earth was saved from an extraterrestrial invasion, and in the years since, the aliens salvaged technology has been used to transform the world. However, it may not be enough to save the human race when a second, even deadlier attack begins. Sci-fi adventure, starring Jeff Goldblum, Liam Hemsworth and Bill Pullman

programme.title: Commando
programme.desc: The daughter of retired special forces officer John Matrix is kidnapped by an old comrade-in-arms, now in league with a deposed former dictator. The tyrant plans to use the girl to force Matrix into assassinating the head of the country he once ruled, but is unprepared for the lengths to which the veteran soldier will go to rescue his child. Action adventure, with Arnold Schwarzenegger and Rae Dawn Chong

programme.title: Dead Mans Shoes
programme.desc: A man returns to his Derbyshire home town and it soon becomes clear he has a dark purpose for revisiting his old stamping ground, and the local drug dealers have plenty of reason to be nervous. Psychological thriller from director Shane Meadows, starring Paddy Considine, Toby Kebbell, Gary Stretch and Stuart Wolfenden

programme.title: Joyland
programme.desc: While a family patriarch yearns for a grandson, his youngest son is swept into a forbidden romance with a trans starlet in a theatre. Drama, with Ali Junejo, Rasti Farooq and Alina Khan. In Pakistani

programme.title: The Remains of the Day
programme.desc: A butler in a 1930s aristocratic household has dedicated himself to serving his master, putting duty above all else and repressing his affection for the housekeeper, who also happens to be in love with him. On the outbreak of war, the noblemans Nazi sympathies come to light, marking a change of heart in the old servant, who looks back with misgivings about the loyalty that may have cost him dearly. Period drama, with Anthony Hopkins, Emma Thompson and James Fox

programme.title: A Lawless Street
programme.desc: A long-serving marshal, who has done his utmost to the keep peace in the town of Medicine Bend, looks forward to a reconciliation with his estranged wife, a touring musical star. Just as she arrives in town, three notorious criminals show up and start causing trouble - and the lawman has to decide whether to hang up his guns for his wifes sake or do his duty. Western, with Randolph Scott, Angela Lansbury, Jean Parker and Warner Anderson

programme.title: The Blue Lamp
programme.desc: A veteran policeman gives a new recruit the benefit of his experience, while two crooks plan a series of robberies. When the two duos meet, the older constable is shot and killed, and his protege sets out to bring the killers to justice. Police drama, starring Jack Warner in a role he would reprise for TV series Dixon of Dock Green. With Jimmy Hanley and Dirk Bogarde

programme.title: Anastasia
programme.desc: In 1920s Paris, exiled Russians claim they have found the daughter of the last Tsar, who was originally believed to have been killed with the rest of her family. She is taken into the care of a General and groomed until she can convince Anastasias cousin Prince Paul that she is genuinely the tsarina and inherit a fortune. Historical drama, starring an Oscar-winning Ingrid Bergman, and Yul Brynner

programme.title: The Old Man and the Gun
programme.desc: Forrest Tucker, a criminal since the age of 15, has escaped from most of the prisons that tried to hold him. At the end of his career, he has become a gentleman bank robber. However, cop John Hunt becomes determined to catch him. Fact-based crime drama, starring the late Robert Redford, with Casey Affleck and Sissy Spacek

programme.title: Tombstone
programme.desc: Renowned marshal Wyatt Earp becomes a professional gambler in the town of Tombstone, but is forced out of his retirement to take on a gang of hellraising villains no one else is prepared to stand up to. Joining forces with his brothers and drunken gunslinger Doc Holliday, he gets ready to face them in a showdown at the OK Corral. Western, starring Kurt Russell, Val Kilmer, Bill Paxton, Sam Elliott, Michael Biehn and Charlton Heston

programme.title: On the Come Up
programme.desc: Brianna Bri Jackson is a 16 year-old girl with dreams of becoming a legendary rapper, while her mother attempts to make ends meet after losing her job. Musical drama directed by Sanaa Lathan, starring Jamila C Gray, DaVine Joy Randolph and Mike Epps

programme.title: Climax
programme.desc: A group of dancers have gathered in a deserted building to rehearse, but someone has spiked the sangria. Writer/director Gaspar Noes psychological horror, starring Sofia Boutella, Kiddy Smile and Romain Guillermic. In French with English subtitles

programme.desc: A fighter kept in captivity from childhood and treated like an animal is forced by his gangster boss to take part in deadly gladiatorial combat. programme.desc: Rosemary attempts to poison Perdy once again but is irked when instead of drinking the mixture, she takes it to the police. Meanwhile, Carl dashes Graces hopes of some time alone.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Carla confronts Leanne, terminating their partnership and asking if she slept with her husband. Liz and Derek risk flirting at a licensees party and Kirk asks Chesney to spy on Fiz.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Carla refuses to take Paul back, so in desperation he arranges a meeting with Leanne - and ends up bundling her into the boot of his car. Denise doubts Kens commitment to Daniel, and Liz is put in an awkward position.

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: Portwenn is buzzing with excitement as the final preparations are made for the Doc and Louisas big day. However, Martin is irritated by PC Penhale, who wrongly presumes he is best man - and to make matters worse, the bride is late. This isnt the first time the couple have tried to get married - will the villagers have to put the confetti back in the box again? Martin Clunes and Caroline Catz star, with John Marquez, Eileen Atkins and Ian McNeice

programme.title: The Royal
programme.desc: Johnny Lomaxs proposal to Matron causes Nigel Harper to worry about the effect her decision will have on the hospital, and Jill comes into conflict with a strict Catholic family. Ormerod and Frankie face a tough rescue operation as they try to save an injured fisherman trapped on board a sinking ship, while Staff Nurse Taylors plans for the future are thwarted once again

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: A fire at the home of a talented artist leads to suspicions of an arson attack, and the resultant police investigation exposes the mans patron as a likely suspect. Greengrass has limited success running a BandB, and Andy tells landlady Gina he has got to make a business trip to Scotland, filling Blaketon with misgivings. Joe McGann guest stars, with Jason Durr, Bill Maynard and Derek Fowlds

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Jackie fights for justice on behalf of a trespasser shot on Lord Ashfordlys land, and Greengrass uses his new job as a newspaper columnist to criticise assorted pillars of society. Rural drama, starring Bill Maynard, Fiona Dolman and Rupert Vansittart.

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Rosemary manipulates Kate when stepping up her campaign against Perdy. Andy receives his decree nisi, leaving Jo in a celebratory mood - but money worries dampen her spirits.

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Grayson is presented with Perdys note by Rosemary but doesnt know what to believe. Katie chides Jo over her lack of engagement ring. A face from the past returns.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Paul drives like a madman to meet Liam and spill the beans about his girlfriend moonlighting as an escort girl - but his erratic driving ends in a horrendous car smash.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: As Pauls life hangs in the balance, Carla and Liam keep a tearful vigil at his bedside, while Michelle rushes to the hospital - only to arrive too late.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Sybils determination to pursue her political leanings lands her in great danger when a fight breaks out at an election results meeting. Matthews tenderness in caring for the would-be suffragette is noticed by her sisters, but it is Mary who is stunned to receive a marriage proposal. Bates is cleared of suspicion over the stolen wine, but offers his resignation rather than name the culprit. Drama, starring Maggie Smith, Hugh Bonneville and Elizabeth McGovern

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: The GP is left holding the baby after upsetting the new childminder, but luckily Mike agrees to look after James at short notice. However, Louisa is not happy with the arrangement and an argument erupts between the newlyweds just as their guests, Dennis and Karen Dodds, arrive for dinner - and thats only the first of the evenings problems. Meanwhile, Ruth is roped into taking part in a phone-in programme on Radio Portwenn and unwittingly answers a call from PC Penhale, who wants to know how to make friends in the village

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: A handsome new locum wins Maggies heart but soon falls out of favour with the locals when a misdiagnosis results in tragedy. A display of courage by Andy reconciles him with Gina, and Greengrasss bike hire business turns out to be seriously flawed _ much to Ventresss discomfort. Rural drama, starring Kazia Pelka and Bill Maynard

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Greengrass embarks on yet another new career, this time trying to earn a crust as a racehorse trainer after a suspicious death at a local stables leaves a window of opportunity. Meanwhile, former copper Blaketons well-honed instincts alert him to council corruption. Nostalgic rural drama, starring Bill Maynard, Derek Fowlds and Jason Durr

programme.title: Foyles War
programme.desc: First episode of the drama, starring Michael Kitchen as a jaded police superintendent who would rather be fighting the enemy in France than crime on the south coast as the Second World War gathers pace in 1940. However, when a local magistrates German wife is murdered amid a growing cloud of uncertainty and anti-Nazi feeling, the ensuing investigation is anything but routine. Edward Fox, Robert Hardy, David Horovitch, Anthony Howell and Honeysuckle Weeks co-star

programme.title: Foyles War
programme.desc: It is July 1945 and, as Britain settles into peacetime, Foyle looks forward to retirement, but finds his life in turmoil once more when Samanthas employer Sir Leonard Spencer-Jones is found dead. Suspicion falls on Niko, a Russian PoW, who flees the Sussex coast and heads for a sanctuary in London - closely followed by Foyle, who has been sent to track him down by the War Office. But the investigation soon brings to light a conspiracy and an international cover-up which, if exposed, could bring down the British government. Max Brown joins the cast, with Michael Kitchen, Honeysuckle Weeks, Anthony Howell, Eleanor Bron and Christopher Good

programme.title: Wire in the Blood
programme.desc: Part one of two. Thrillers based on the novels by Val McDermid, starring Robson Green as eccentric clinical psychologist Dr Tony Hill. In the first tale, he is recruited by DI Carol Jordan to help track down a serial killer preying on men in the northern town of Bradfield, but his methods fail to win much support among the other officers on the case. With Hermione Norris and Philip Whitchurch

programme.title: Wire in the Blood
programme.desc: Part two of two. Clinical psychologist Dr Tony Hill continues his hunt for the serial killer preying on men in the northern town of Bradfield, but finds his efforts hampered by the local polices scorn for his unconventional methods. With only DI Carol Jordan prepared to believe in him, Tony must draw on all his reserves of strength and insight to bring the case to a shocking conclusion. Thriller, starring Robson Green and Hermione Norris

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Rosemary tries to explain her actions to Grayson, though his fury increases as he realises the extent of her campaign. Elsewhere, theres a surprise in store for Jo.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Ken is down in the dumps when it seems no one wants anything to do with him - so Denise makes a pass at her vulnerable ex. Leanne finds herself the centre of gossip.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Ken goes home to make his peace with Deirdre - just as she is toasting the single life on a night out with the girls. The Connors prepare to leave for the funeral in Ireland.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Cora makes a discovery that throws the inheritance issue into chaos, and Mary is prompted to keep Matthew waiting for an answer to his proposal. Robert arranges for Mrs Patmore to see an eye specialist, and OBrien digs up more compromising information about Bates, but the Earls response comes as a surprise. Thomas leaves the Abbey and Mary exacts vengeance on Edith for her treachery, while the household is rocked by a shocking announcement. Drama, starring Maggie Smith, Hugh Bonneville and Elizabeth McGovern

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: A secret admirer makes Ruth feel a little uncomfortable when he places a red rose on her car windscreen and then leaves a birthday cake on her kitchen table while shes at the radio station, and when matters take a turn for the worse, Martin has no choice but to take drastic action. Meanwhile, Bert is furious when one of Louisas pupils writes a damning review of his restaurant in the school newspaper, and a new pharmacist arrives in the village. Annabelle Apsion (Shameless) joins the cast

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Bernie reveals a hidden talent, while Phil Bellamy is babysitting Maggie Boltons son Sam, but when he wakes up from a little nap to feed the baby, Sam has gone missing. Rural police drama set in the rustic backwater of Aidensfield, Yorkshire, starring Kazia Pelka and Peter Benson

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: A criminals wife commits suicide, making Mike wish he had not been quite so forceful in extracting a confession. Meanwhile, Blaketon has the misfortune of getting mixed up in Greengrasss latest scheme to make a few bob. Rural drama, with Bill Maynard, Derek Fowlds and Michael Angelis

programme.title: Foyles War
programme.desc: Racial tensions erupt in Hastings when a black GI is suspected of murdering a local woman. The victim, an ex-lover of the suspect and the mother of his baby, was staying at a guest house where Samantha is assistant manager, and had been disowned by her family because of her mixed-race child. As Foyle investigates, he is not convinced the soldier could be capable of such a crime, and soon comes up against the might of the US Army as he tries to crack the case. Starring Michael Kitchen, Honeysuckle Weeks, Obi Abili and Charlotte Riley

programme.title: Foyles War
programme.desc: As Foyle prepares to be replaced at the police station and begin retirement, his attention is grabbed by a news story about a man sentenced to hang for high treason, and he decides to take on the case. But with the prisoners execution date approaching, the detective has to work fast to find evidence that will clear him. Meanwhile, Samantha and Adam fight to save Hill House from the town planners determined to demolish it - but disaster soon strikes. Starring Michael Kitchen, Honeysuckle Weeks and Max Brown

programme.title: Wire in the Blood
programme.desc: Part one of two. Psychological profiler Tony is assigned to help when a teenagers body is dragged from a lake, while his detective partner Carol visits a celebrity couple being plagued by a stalker. At first the pair find their relationship challenged by having to work apart, but then they find a connection between the dead body and the stalker. Mystery thriller, starring Robson Green and Hermione Norris, with guest appearances by Doon Mackichan and John Michie

programme.title: Wire in the Blood
programme.desc: Part two of two. Beths murder has a devastating effect on Amanda Vance, leaving her on the verge of a breakdown, although the tragedy at least provides a wealth of clues for Tony and Carol to follow up. However, it soon becomes clear time is of the essence when another girl with a resemblance to the previous victims goes missing. Mystery thriller, starring Robson Green, Hermione Norris, Doon Mackichan and John Michie
