programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: A Glasgow couple face a major renovation project at their Italian rural retreat, while a couple from Brighton take on the French at their own game by opening a cheese and wine bar

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: In Italy, an ambitious re-build looks more like a demolition site. Foodies from Brighton are left high and dry on the opening night of their cheese and wine bar, while theres an unwelcome infestation for glampsite owners in Portugal

programme.title: Chateau DIY
programme.desc: The series that follows British families buying and renovating beautiful chateaux in France returns. Nick and Nicole battle sub-zero temperatures as they attempt to transform a wing of a derelict chateau with no running water or electricity into a habitable space

programme.title: Chateau DIY
programme.desc: Tim and Rebecca prepare to host their first-ever floral retreat at Chateau de la Ruche and progress is slow in the Dordogne for Nick and Nicole as they try to convert their chateau into a liveable apartment before the arrival of their first child. Ben and Billie are left in the dark when a fuse blows in their grand suite at Chateau la Grand Maison

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The contest begins at Shannon Slater-Dent and Trevor Tredgetts Bove Town House in Glastonbury. The duo are keen to show off what their BandB is all about, so lead an afternoon of group sound healing. While Ben Davenport and Sian Dewaal from the Fritton Arms immediately recognise that this BandB will be tough competition, Stevie King and his head chef Dave from SugarBeat Eating House dismiss the activity as being hippy. However, its the poor nights sleep that bothers Kathryn and her best friend Trevor, from Treberthan BandB, as well as the fact they have to cook their own breakfast. At feedback time, the idea of self BandB comes under fire and Kathryn doesnt hold back with her sleep score

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The second visit is to Treberthan BandB in Par, Cornwall, where owner Kathryn Langley and her best friend Trevor Burnell set out to give their guests a taste of Cornish hospitality. Everyones impressed by the high standard of cleanliness, but Stevie and David are put off by the old-fashioned decor. A Cornish pasty making competition reveals Kathryns assertive streak, while professional chef David feels under pressure to win, Ben and Sian make an unconventional pasty, and Shannon and Trevor forget a vital ingredient. At breakfast, a request for goats milk puts Kathryn under pressure

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Stevie King and his head chef David Lovett host at SugarBeat Eating House in Swainsthorpe in Norfolk. The cleanliness comes under fire as Kathryn and Trevor struggle with their marked shower screen, and Ben and Sian write a message in the dust they find. Over dinner, Ben goes into detective mode to find out everything he can about his SugarBeat rivals. However, its Kathryns straight talking that becomes the talking point for Shannon and Trevor

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The final visit of the week is to the Fritton Arms in Norfolk, run by Ben Davenport and partner Sian Dewaal. David and Stevie are upset about their feedback so they conduct a forensic-style room inspection - complete with rubber gloves - and a paddleboat race on a nearby lake brings out everyones competitive nature. Ben impresses the guests by revealing the hotels aristocratic connections - but soon comes under fire for allowing pets to stay

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The owners reunite to find out what they have been paid, with Shannon and Trevor from Bove Town House wanting to discuss Kathryns comments about her poor nights sleep

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim Shaw and Fuzz Townshend head to Wellingborough, Northamptonshire, to pick up a 1988 Fiat Uno Turbo, one of the fastest hatchbacks of its time. The car belongs to car salesman Gerry, a dyed-in-the-wool boy racer. Sadly, Gerrys ill health has meant that the Uno has been tucked away and left to rot on his drive. His friends and family hope the boys treatment can bring some joy back into Gerrys life

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim Shaw and Fuzz Townshend head off to Huddersfield, West Yorkshire, to rescue a 1992 VW Corrado, a German coupe that, in its time, was one of the fastest small family cars on the road. The car belongs to 37-year-old Ashley, who even went as far as changing his surname to match his car. Sadly, when Ashley fell ill, his car ended up rotting away under a cover

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer visit the Great British seaside in Kent to search for properties for two sets of buyers. Kirstie is searching for a home for a family of six, who had the perfect property but lost it due to a clerical error, while Phil helps a family from London as they search for an idyllic seaside lifestyle

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer are in Yorkshire, where more space is key to their house-hunters. Kirsties with active couple and NHS workers Emily and Joe, whose rental agreement is coming to an end, and theyre having trouble finding a perfect first home which is big enough for all their belongings. Kirstie needs to act fast to find them a place which has the potential to become more than just a starter home. Two properties catch their eyes, so they have to be quick in deciding which suits them best; and Kirstie has to be even quicker to try to secure one. Meanwhile, Phils search for space is even more pressing - hes with a family-of-five who are sleeping between two bedrooms in a home thats bursting at the seams. Suki, Kuli, and their three young daughters are currently squashed into a three-bedroom house, and with home worker Kuli using one bedroom as a home office, the pressures on Phil to find them a bigger house. It must be roomy enough to host family and friends, have good outside space, and not be too far from where they currently live. Its a tight brief, but Phil manages to find a contender. Its then down to Suki and Kuli to decide if this could be the home that finally brings their quest for space to an end

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Colin Mackinnon and his partner Marta Briongos take on an ambitious project to build a bespoke metal home next to an airfield runway, designed by one of Scotlands most eminent architects and inspired by aircraft hangars. They have to contend with violent rain, snow, 100mph winds and the worst storms for a century, and the couple have to draw on their reserves of mental energy, as what was supposed to be a 12-month build heads into a third year

programme.title: Ancient Autopsy
programme.desc: Professor Suzannah Lipscomb explores whether Alexander the Great died from poison, trauma or a deadly virus. She discovers surprising clues in a tiny Babylonian tablet and explores new virological theories with experts at the UKs Pandemic Institute. And through digital autopsy, Dr Richard Shepherd helps shed new light on the ancient worlds most debated death

programme.title: Ancient Egypt by Train with Alice Roberts
programme.desc: Alice arrives in Cairo by train and follows in the footsteps of Victorian Egyptologist Amelia Edwards. The journey takes her to the Great Pyramids, where she is allowed to climb deep inside to see the tomb and sarcophagus of the pharaoh Khufu. In Saqqara she learns how and why the pyramids came about, and even finds time for a spot of shopping in a Cairo souk

programme.title: 999: On the Front Line
programme.desc: A family flee their home as fire breaks out. All the emergency services are sent to the scene. While queuing in a fish and chip shop, a woman collapses with a possible stroke. The mottled appearance of a two-year-olds skin, coupled with an increased temperature, prompts a mother to ring for an ambulance

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: A 21-year-old woman on her first trip to London from Northern Ireland appears to be experiencing kidney failure, and medics fear she could be at risk of a cardiac arrest. A man in a critical condition after falling 20ft from a balcony is brought in by helicopter, and a 34-year-old who fell off her platform shoes while dancing is treated for a deep gash on her forehead

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: Ninety-three-year-old Ernest is brought in with life-threatening injuries after being knocked down by a hit-and-run driver just outside the hospital. He goes into cardiac arrest, and a consultant must keep his heart going manually in a bid to save his life. Meanwhile, an 83-year-olds finger is mangled by a machine at his metal-working business, and a 51-year-old man with learning difficulties is treated after collapsing, prompting his elderly mother to wonder how he will eventually cope after her death

programme.title: Ancient Autopsy
programme.desc: Professor Suzannah Lipscomb explores whether Alexander the Great died from poison, trauma or a deadly virus. She discovers surprising clues in a tiny Babylonian tablet and explores new virological theories with experts at the UKs Pandemic Institute. And through digital autopsy, Dr Richard Shepherd helps shed new light on the ancient worlds most debated death

programme.title: Food Unwrapped
programme.desc: Matt Tebbutt reveals the sweet secret to iced writing on supermarket birthday cakes, and Jimmy Doherty jets to Japan to establish why soy is in so many of the UKs favourite foods, also learning how this little bean could be health-enhancing. Kate Quilton looks at the growing trend of hemp-based food products

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: Glampsite owners in Portugal face the reality of living off-grid, and at a horse riding centre in France, cameras follow a mother and daughter with grand plans

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: The owners of a glampsite have transport trouble in Portugal. A former art teacher opens a gallery in Spain, while mother-and-daughter equestrians hope to ride out a rough patch

programme.title: Chateau DIY
programme.desc: Erin and JB take on the task of renovating one of the turrets at Chateau de Bourneau and Ben and Billie host their first couples weekend. Nick gets pulled away from urgent renovation to sandblast the entire facade of Chateau des Vieilles Vignes

programme.title: Chateau DIY
programme.desc: A storm is brewing in western France, putting pressure on Erin and JB to get the windows back into their huge turret renovation before all their efforts might be rained off. At Château la Grande Maison, Ben and Billie have the enormous job of renovating their entrance gatehouse. Elsewhere, Nick and Nicole have only four weeks to make part of their chateau habitable before their babys due date. Narrated by Adjoa Andoh

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The contest begins at the Richard III in Middleham, North Yorkshire, a pub run by husband and wife Ken and Sharon, who become suspicious when one couple check out before breakfast. The village is known for its horse racing links, but one of the competitors, Matt Wilson, has a fear of horses, and another couple are concerned at staying above a noisy pub

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The second visit is to the Court House Unique Boutique BandB in Shelsley Walsh, Worcestershire, where hosts Keith and Lisa Shearin hope to impress. On arrival, Ken and Sharon are blown away by their honeymoon suite and the seemingly low price. Suspicions over price fixing drive Matt and Paul to the internet to verify the room rate, where they discover an anomaly, and despite Keiths best efforts at breakfast, Jo and Louis dismiss it as being too fancy

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The contestants travel to Castley Camp in Otley, West Yorkshire, for the third day of the contest, owned by single mum Jo Stevenson and her son Louis. Some of the guests are horrified by stains on their bedding and dust in their room, while an afternoon boot camp fitness session reveals Keiths competitive side. At feedback, Jo is left fuming over the comments about cleanliness and breakfast

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The final two days see the contestants staying the night at the Lion and Swan in Congleton, Cheshire, run by owner Paul Whyle and manager Matt Wilson. A dirty bathroom and a waterbed cause upset, while some guests are still fuming about previous negative feedback. However, the worst is left for breakfast, when Sharon reveals she has discovered their rooms online at a higher price than they were told, upsetting Keith and Lisa and leaving the hosts determined to clear their names

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The BandB owners meet for the last time to find out what theyve been paid and to settle some scores. First up are Ken and Sharon from the Richard III, who want to learn more about whats been causing Jo and Louis to lose sleep. Next, Keith and Lisa from the Court House Unique Boutique BandB want to challenge Matt about the allegations of price fixing and vehemently fight their corner. Needless to say, there is tension in the air and axes to grind, before the winner is revealed

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim Shaw and Fuzz Townshend head to Rochdale to rescue an Opel Manta GTE. The car belongs to former amateur rally driver Alan, who loved his Manta so much he couldnt bear to part with it, even when it went off the road. With Alan becoming a bit of a recluse after developing health problems and losing his wife to cancer, his family and friends hope that the Car S.O.S treatment will be just the thing to bring Alan back out of his shell

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim Shaw and Fuzz Townshend head to Dorset to pick up a Ford Escort MK2 RS2000, which belongs to carpenter Mike. After his son was involved in a horrific road accident, Mike gave up work and supported him through a four-year recovery. Now, Mikes family want to give something back to offer thanks to such a devoted father by presenting him with his fully restored RS2000

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Phil Spencer catches up with two couples who had high hopes for their first homes. He helped Keon and Zoe search west and south London, while Kirstie Allsopp was with Laura and Phil, who wanted to settle in Bath. What twists and turns have their lives and property hunts taken?

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: In Cambridgeshire, Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer meet house-hunters who want to stay close to home. Single mum-of-two Ali met widower Nick during the first Covid lockdown, and now that they have their first child together, theyre hoping to upsize in the picturesque village of Stilton. Newly-weds Hannah and Hugo need to move out of Hannahs parents house and into their own place - somewhere big enough for Hugos two children to have their own space when they come to stay. Kirstie soon learns that her Stilton search area is smaller than expected but nonetheless shes committed to get Ali and Nick into their first home together. She shows them some great options - but then a previously over-budget dream house comes within their grasp. Phil is also working with a tight search area, but he still finds a lot for Hannah and Hugo to love. Theyre looking for that elusive feeling for their first marital home, but that soon develops into finding the balance between head and heart. Whichever way they go, Phil needs to be as sharp as ever if hes to get them over the threshold

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud follows a project to renovate and extend a classic 1920s cinema in Thorne, South Yorkshire. With little knowledge of restoration, Gwyn and Kate boldly set about turning the dilapidated building into a family home using masses of concrete after taking advice from an architect friend. The couple are hoping to create a hydraulic glass wall that opens up one side of the house to form a UV-filtered canopy, and there are also plans for a white roof extension that resembles a diving board

programme.title: Our Welsh Chapel Dream
programme.desc: Keith and Marj focus on the last thing they need to do to finally call Capel Salem home: bringing the bedroom inside the building! Marj gilds a vintage French mirror, while Keith takes on storage solutions and they both reflect on their journey so far by visiting a Welsh love spoon workshop

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: Consultant Emer Sutherland helps treat an eight-year-old who has fallen 8ft onto concrete while riding his BMX, losing his front teeth and possibly injuring his head and spine. A 19-year-old motorcyclist who hit a bollard requires urgent treatment on his leg, which may otherwise need to be amputated, and X-rays of a stabbing victim yield startling results

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: A woman with a weak immune system owing to the radiotherapy she underwent for breast cancer is bitten by her cat, a minor injury that could cause her serious problems. A 71-year-old with terminal cancer is brought in with breathing difficulties and a decision must be made about whether to resuscitate her if her condition worsens. Meanwhile, a 12-year-old translates for his Brazilian grandmother and a five-year-old has her head wound stitched

programme.title: 999: On the Front Line
programme.desc: One-off special in which paramedics respond to reports of a patient in cardiac arrest. When they arrive, theres no answer at the door. Concerned that an elderly relative is attempting CPR inside, they break down two sets of doors to gain entry. Inside they discover an exhausted wife who, despite her own physical problems, has been trying to save her husbands life. Elsewhere, a PE lesson at school ends abruptly when a young boy has an epileptic seizure

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: Consultant Emer Sutherland helps treat an eight-year-old who has fallen 8ft onto concrete while riding his BMX, losing his front teeth and possibly injuring his head and spine. A 19-year-old motorcyclist who hit a bollard requires urgent treatment on his leg, which may otherwise need to be amputated, and X-rays of a stabbing victim yield startling results

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: A woman with a weak immune system owing to the radiotherapy she underwent for breast cancer is bitten by her cat, a minor injury that could cause her serious problems. A 71-year-old with terminal cancer is brought in with breathing difficulties and a decision must be made about whether to resuscitate her if her condition worsens. Meanwhile, a 12-year-old translates for his Brazilian grandmother and a five-year-old has her head wound stitched

programme.title: Food Unwrapped
programme.desc: In search of the secret to the bubbles in bubble tea, Kate Quilton visits a cassava farm in Kenya to get to the root of it. Jimmy Doherty is in Somerset exploring why sour milk is sneered at, though soured cream is revered. Plus, Helen Lawal reports from Portugal on canned fish

programme.title: The Hills
programme.desc: Kristin says she is through with Justin, but he refuses to let her go easily, Jayde wants to move in with Brody, and Spencer confronts Heidi over her possible pregnancy

programme.title: 16 and Pregnant
programme.desc: Kali and Auston were shocked to get pregnant so young. Kalis parents feel theyve been forced to take Auston in, while Austons grandparents just want him home

After this experience of a lifetime, its back to the water and a paddle to the stunning Kinnegoe Bay and the cliffs of Inishowen Head, before crossing Lough Foyle into Co Derry, where they visit the ruins of Saint Aidans church at Magilligan. In Irish

In Alans quest to stay true to Sicilian culture, he treats Amanda to a visit to Marsalas salt pans for a unique spa experience. Amandas dreams of a roll-top bath come crashing down as Alan sets her the task of recycling the apartments existing one, but karma kicks in as his DIY skills are pushed to the limit with a masterclass in floor tiling

programme.title: Amanda and Alans Italian Job

programme.desc: Alan Cumming heads across the Irish Sea to Dublin, where he succumbs to the citys famous charm and meets some of its most fascinating characters. In the fashionable district of Meguro, Richard takes in the Claska, which was the citys first boutique hotel and has its own canine beauty salon

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: The Commodore exploits his connections within the Coast Guard to throttle Atlantic Citys liquor supply - so Nucky responds by calling in a favour from Washingtons new attorney general, Harry Daugherty. Irish republican Owen Sleater sets about proving his worth by intercepting a delivery, but his actions put more pressure on Lolly Steinman. Meanwhile, Margaret reveals her secret to the household staff, and Lucy struggles to cope with her loneliness

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: Jimmy and Mickey find themselves with a surplus of liquor and decide to take advantage by expanding their operations into new territories. Nucky discovers his lawyer may have found a way to fend off the corruption charges, Eli fears the Commodores leadership abilities are on the wane, Chalky comes under pressure at home and at work, and Owen decides to demonstrate his expertise. Drama, starring Steve Buscemi and Michael Shannon

Eli questions his allegiances as his options start to dwindle, Jimmy is taught a painful lesson by one of the Commodores associates and Richard Harrow goes hunting in the forest

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: Nucky orchestrates a risky liquor delivery in Philadelphia - but in Atlantic City, attorney general Daugherty encounters a problem that could complicate the electoral fraud investigation. programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: Part two of two. The officers continue their investigation into the sniper attacks and a copycat killer emerges. Gritty police drama, guest starring chat show host Jay Leno

programme.sub-title: The Laws of Gods and Men
programme.desc: Stannis and Davos arrive in Braavos for their meeting with the Iron Bank, but find Tycho Nestoris (Mark Gatiss) a hard man to do business with. Yara Greyjoy leads a band of Ironborn on a mission to rescue her brother Theon, while Daenerys meets with supplicants in Meereen. In Kings Landing, Tyrions trial begins in the throne room and he is stunned by the identity of one of the crowns witnesses. Fantasy drama, starring Stephen Dillane and Peter Dinklage

programme.title: Game of Thrones

Fantasy drama, starring Peter Dinklage, Kit Harington and Emilia Clarke

programme.desc: Colin presses a local priest about the vague circumstances that prompted his transfer to the parish. Later, an anonymous call gives Dawn hope that Katie might still be alive

programme.title: Banshee

When the towns incoming sheriff is killed, the opportunistic former jailbird adds identity theft to his list of crimes and takes on the mans identity and his job. Fantasy drama, starring Peter Dinklage and Pedro Pascal

Sam gets some sage advice about love from Maester Aemon and is shocked when someone comes knocking at the gates seeking shelter. Fantasy drama, starring Kit Harington and directed by Neil Marshall, the man behind the second series episode depicting the Battle of the Blackwater

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: The cameras follow three teams of fishermen participating in Brixhams annual Trawler Race, including a father and son who have been pitted against each other. Landlady Pat Seddon is not looking forward to the raucous celebrations, however, and decides to reminisce about past race days instead. The programme also meets Matt Kimble, a graduate who gave up on his plan to become a PE teacher and decided to follow his ancestors into the fishing trade instead

programme.title: Urban Secrets
programme.desc: Alan Cumming visits Glasgow, one of his favourite cities, to reveal unusual and often hidden sights and sounds overlooked by the public. Starting at the Necropolis, he travels to the worlds oldest music hall before enjoying the views from a city-centre landmark. He also finds the time to take tea with a film star

programme.title: Richard E Grants Hotel Secrets
programme.desc: Richard E Grant travels to Venice, said to be the city with the highest concentration of luxury hotels on the planet. He discovers how a measuring error led to the building of the citys biggest swimming pool, tries out a 15,000 euro-a-night royal suite whose bed has been slept in by everyone from the Beckhams to Prince Charles and the Duchess of Cornwall, and visits a hotel that keeps its doors open even when water floods to knee height. He also finds out why breaking a window once earned Ernest Hemingway a 10 per cent discount on his room

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: Nucky decides to tell his enemies what they want to hear - before springing a surprise at a Memorial Day service. Eli questions his allegiances as his options start to dwindle, Jimmy is taught a painful lesson by one of the Commodores associates and Richard Harrow goes hunting in the forest

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: Nucky orchestrates a risky liquor delivery in Philadelphia - but in Atlantic City, attorney general Daugherty encounters a problem that could complicate the electoral fraud investigation. Leander Whitlock, the Commodores lawyer, takes Jimmy under his wing, while Van Alden is plagued by his conscience as Lucy struggles to live in solitude

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.desc: Perry works to expose the Radiant Assemblys corrupt finances, and Drakes detective work opens a new avenue in the investigation

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.desc: As the trial winds to a close, Mason and team attempt to tie up loose ends - and set the stage for their futures

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: In Kings Landing, the day of King Joffreys wedding to Margaery Tyrell arrives, and while the sadistic monarch delights in tormenting his uncle Tyrion, the capitals various factions plot further alliances. However, all attention is drawn back to Joffrey following the arrival of a pie filled with live birds. Meanwhile, Melisandre oversees a sacrifice to the Lord of Light at Dragonstone as three traitors are burned at the stake, and the future continues to look grim for Theon as Ramsay Snow finds a use for him. North of the Wall, Bran sees clearly where he and his friends must go after experiencing a series of visions

programme.title: My Brilliant Friend
programme.desc: Italian drama series based on Elena Ferrantes novel, following the lives of two girls from Naples over six decades of their friendship. The disappearance of her old friend, Lila Cerrullo, causes 60-year-old author Elena Greco to reflect on the early days of their friendship in 1950s Naples. In Italian

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: Margaret travels to Brooklyn for a difficult reunion with the family she left behind in Ireland, while Jimmy faces a decision that could shape the future of Atlantic City. The arrival of Daughertys new federal prosecutor leaves Van Alden weighing his options, a despairing Lucy turns to an old friend for support, and Nucky sets about promoting heavyweight boxing champion Jack Dempseys next fight

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: Nucky struggles to deal with a personal loss and seeks advice from Rothstein about his precarious political situation. Jimmy demonstrates his growing authority at Mickeys expense, while Van Alden tries to remedy his fractious relationship with Lucy by hiring a nanny. Prohibition-era drama, starring Steve Buscemi

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: Kellerman and Lewis are ordered to Pennsylvania to extradite a female murder suspect. Police drama, starring Clark Johnson and Reed Diamond

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: Pembleton and Bayliss investigate the case of a man who died from internal bleeding, despite being treated at a hospital earlier that day. Lewis and Kellerman attempt to subdue someone who has gone on a rampage, and Kay tries to conceal the identity of her new boyfriend

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Tyrions fate is decided as his champion Oberyn Martell faces against Gregor the Mountain Clegane in his trial by combat, while Moles Town is on the receiving end of a raid by the wildlings. Ramsay sends Theon into Moat Cailin to negotiate the surrender of the Ironborn troops holding the fort, Littlefinger and Sansa are questioned about the circumstances surrounding Lysas death and Barristan confronts Jorah about a document delivered to him. Fantasy drama, starring Peter Dinklage and Pedro Pascal

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: The men of the Nights Watch face their biggest challenge yet as they prepare to defend the Wall and Castle Black against attacks from the north and south by Mance Rayders wildling army, with Ygritte determined to be the one to kill Jon Snow. Sam gets some sage advice about love from Maester Aemon and is shocked when someone comes knocking at the gates seeking shelter. Fantasy drama, starring Kit Harington and directed by Neil Marshall, the man behind the second series episode depicting the Battle of the Blackwater

programme.title: Gomorrah
programme.desc: The return of the gritty Italian mafia drama. With Ciro dead and Naples set for an all-out war, Genny turns to the Levante family for help. In Italian

programme.title: Gomorrah
programme.desc: Once balance in the city has been restored, Genny reinvents himself as a businessman, but finds it impossible to leave his violent past behind him. In Italian

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Jackie Jr goes into hiding after his failed armed robbery at Eugene Pontecorvos card game and calls to try to work things out with Tony, who meets Ralph and tells him he has to decide what to do about him. AJ is expelled from school for cheating in an exam, prompting his father to threaten to send him to a military academy

programme.title: The Pacific
programme.desc: The Marines return home following the Japanese surrender, but a demoralised Sledge struggles to cope with the horrors he saw during the campaign. Leckies relationship with his parents deteriorates, and Lena meets Basilones family for the first time. Conclusion of the Second World War drama, starring James Badge Dale and Joseph Mazzello

programme.title: Banshee
programme.desc: Carrie pleads with Lucas to leave the area after he accosts her while she is showing a house to prospective buyers, while a drug dealer who works for Kai Proctor prepares to throw a rave in a farmhouse, leaving the Amish elders up in arms. As the sheriff and his men make their move, it soon becomes evident that Lucas isnt familiar with normal law-enforcement procedures as he adopts a somewhat violent approach to getting the job done

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Jon Snow heads into the wildling camp to try to negotiate a peace with Mance Rayder, but an unexpected arrival changes the situation at the Wall, while Daenerys is forced to make a decision about the dragons in Meereen. Cersei demands that Tywin call off her engagement to Loras Tyrell, Bran learns more about his destiny, and Tyrion receives a visit from Jaime as he awaits his fate. Fantasy drama based on George RR Martins A Song of Ice and Fire series of novels, starring Peter Dinklage and Emilia Clarke

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: At Castle Black, Jon Snow struggles to mediate between wildling leader Mance Rayder and Stannis Baratheon, while a mournful Cersei continues to worry about the future of her son Tommen in Kings Landing. Tyrion arrives in a new location and is presented with a fresh opportunity and Daenerys grapples with the politics of power in Meereen, as well as her tempestuous dragons. Starring Kit Harington, Lena Headey, Peter Dinklage and Emilia Clarke

programme.title: In Treatment
programme.desc: Sophies therapy session takes an interesting direction when her mother decides to join her. Drama, starring Gabriel Byrne

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: Brixham residents raise money for a statue to commemorate fishermen lost at sea, but Pat Seddons plan to support the cause by participating in a fundraising skydive worries her friends and relatives. Jan Hart goes trawling for scallops, and shares some ancient superstitions

programme.title: Borat Subsequent Moviefilm
programme.desc: Borat returns from Kazakhstan to America intent on giving his fifteen year old daughter to the vice president. While on his mission, Borat also learns more about the American culture, the COVID-19 pandemic and political elections. Spoof documentary sequel, starring Sacha Baron Cohen

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Barton Academy boarding school teacher Paul Hunham incurs the wrath of headmaster Dr Hardy Woodrup by failing the son of a powerful senator. As punishment, Woodrup selects Paul to remain on campus over Christmas to chaperone the boys who wont be travelling home for the holidays. Alexander Paynes comedy drama, starring Paul Giamatti, DaVine Joy Randolph and Dominic Sessa

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: A power-crazed bully, a sleazy cocaine addict and a sexual predator each make an employees life a misery, but the three workers cannot afford to quit their jobs. They resort to desperate measures by conspiring to murder each others bosses, with a little help from an eccentric ex-convict. Comedy, starring Jason Bateman, Charlie Day, Jason Sudeikis, Kevin Spacey, Jennifer Aniston and Colin Farrell

programme.title: The Accidental Husband
programme.desc: Radio talk-show host Dr Emma Lloyd advises a caller to her show to leave her boyfriend - who gets even by falsifying civil records to make it seem he and Emma are legally married, even though they have never met. This presents Emma with a big problem, as she is currently planning her wedding. Romantic comedy, starring Uma Thurman, Colin Firth and Jeffrey Dean Morgan

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Having settled their differences, Brad and Dustys newfound friendship is put to the test when their respective fathers - one gentle, the other overly macho - arrive for the Christmas holidays, forcing them to change their plans. What starts as a break at a fun-filled trip to a luxury resort turns into something far more chaotic. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell, Mark Wahlberg, Mel Gibson and John Lithgow

programme.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
programme.desc: A family tragedy woos Delia Deetz, daughter Lydia and rebellious teenage granddaughter Astrid back to the close-knit community of Winter River. Astrid accidentally opens a portal to the afterlife by summoning Beetlejuice three times. The mischievous demon ricochets between realms, wreaking havoc wherever he goes. Tim Burtons comedy sequel, starring Michael Keaton, Winona Ryder and Jenna Ortega

programme.title: The Death of Stalin
programme.desc: The place is Moscow, the year is 1953 and after being in power for nearly 30 years, Soviet dictator Joseph Stalin dies after an inconveniently brief illness. Amid the shock, the members of the Council of Ministers engage in a chaotic bid for power. Armando Iannuccis political satire, starring Andrea Riseborough, Jason Isaacs, Rupert Friend, Simon Russell Beale, Steve Buscemi, Jeffrey Tambor and Michael Palin

programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: An immature 32-year-old is heartbroken when his girlfriend walks out on him. In a plan to win her back, he volunteers to look after his flatmates five-year-old son, thus demonstrating he is finally ready to grow up. However, his ideas of childcare prove unconventional and chaos quickly ensues. Comedy, with Adam Sandler, Joey Lauren Adams, Jon Stewart, Josh Mostel, Leslie Mann, Rob Schneider and Kristy Swanson, alongside Steve Buscemi in a cameo role

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: A woman struggling to cope with a rebellious daughter and a marriage that has strayed into a rocky patch discovers a shocking family secret - her parents marriage is not legal. She decides to try and resolve the situation by getting the family to rally round and organise the most elaborate wedding imaginable. Romantic comedy sequel, starring Nia Vardalos and John Corbett

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: When New York University professor Rachel Chu heads to Singapore with her boyfriend, Nick Young, shes surprised to learn hes from an extremely wealthy family. The problem is they arent so approving of her, so she attempts to win them over. Blockbusting comedy based on Kevin Kwans novel, starring Constance Wu, Henry Golding, Gemma Chan and Michelle Yeoh

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs the World
programme.desc: A directionless bassist meets the girl of his dreams, but finds that romancing her comes with a dangerous catch. She has seven evil ex-lovers, all endowed with tremendous fighting skills or superpowers - and before he can go out with her, he is expected to face each one in a battle to the death. Comedy adventure, starring Michael Cera, Mary Elizabeth Winstead and Jason Schwartzman

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: A washed-up quarterback ends up in jail after a drunken night out, and is ordered by the warden to put together an American football team to take on the guards, with the help of a former college champ. Remake of 1974 comedy The Mean Machine, with Adam Sandler, Chris Rock, Nelly and Burt Reynolds, who starred in the original

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: A journalist desperate to be posted to a war zone encounters a special forces agent, who claims to have been part of a top-secret project to endow soldiers with superhuman powers. As the reporter joins the supposed psychic on a journey across Iraq, he discovers the bizarre story behind the experiment. Satirical comedy, starring George Clooney, Ewan McGregor, Jeff Bridges and Kevin Spacey

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: A portly Mexican friar working as a cook in an orphanage adopts the guise of a masked wrestler. He teams up with a thief and enters a tournament hoping to win enough money to sort out the monasterys financial problems, feed the kids under his care and impress the nun he is in love with. Comedy, starring Jack Black and Ana de la Reguera

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: A veteran lifeguard commands a highly trained team that keeps the sun-kissed resort of Emerald Bay safe. As he breaks in some new recruits - including an insubordinate former Olympic swimmer - he has to contend with a dangerous new drug sweeping the beach. Action comedy based on the TV series, starring Dwayne Johnson, Zac Efron, Alexandra Daddario and Priyanka Chopra

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: A woman struggling to cope with a rebellious daughter and a marriage that has strayed into a rocky patch discovers a shocking family secret - her parents marriage is not legal. She decides to try and resolve the situation by getting the family to rally round and organise the most elaborate wedding imaginable. Romantic comedy sequel, starring Nia Vardalos and John Corbett

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: An obese, terminally shy professor invents a potion that transforms him into a slim, loud-mouthed charmer. His new streamlined self immediately sets out to woo the woman of his dreams - but soon starts to ride roughshod over everything he used to care about. Remake of the 1963 Jerry Lewis comedy, starring Eddie Murphy, Jada Pinkett Smith, James Coburn and Larry Miller

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Bumbling scientist Sherman Klump is engaged to be married and determined to rid himself of his troublesome alter ego Buddy Love for ever. All his problems look set to be solved by his fiancees latest DNA experiment - but things are about to spiral out of control. Comedy sequel, starring Eddie Murphy in multiple roles, along with Janet Jackson and Larry Miller

programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: An architect has a fling with a kooky waitress, who takes it upon herself to move into his house and pass herself off as his wife. When the woman he is actually in love with says she thinks the sham marriage is good for him, he decides to play along with the deception. Romantic comedy, starring Steve Martin, Goldie Hawn, Dana Delany, Donald Moffat and Julie Harris

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: A journalist desperate to be posted to a war zone encounters a special forces agent, who claims to have been part of a top-secret project to endow soldiers with superhuman powers. As the reporter joins the supposed psychic on a journey across Iraq, he discovers the bizarre story behind the experiment. Satirical comedy, starring George Clooney, Ewan McGregor, Jeff Bridges and Kevin Spacey

programme.title: David Brent: Life on the Road
programme.desc: More than a decade on from his appearance in documentary series The Office, a film crew is once again following the life of David Brent. He is now working as a rep for a cleaning-goods distributor, but harbours dreams of making it big in the music business. Acting on this, he takes three weeks off work and tours with a new-look version of Foregone Conclusion, the band he fronted in the 1990s. Mockumentary comedy, starring Ricky Gervais, Ben Bailey Smith and Tom Basden.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: When New York University professor Rachel Chu heads to Singapore with her boyfriend, Nick Young, shes surprised to learn hes from an extremely wealthy family. The problem is they arent so approving of her, so she attempts to win them over. Blockbusting comedy based on Kevin Kwans novel, starring Constance Wu, Henry Golding, Gemma Chan and Michelle Yeoh

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: A power-crazed bully, a sleazy cocaine addict and a sexual predator each make an employees life a misery, but the three workers cannot afford to quit their jobs. They resort to desperate measures by conspiring to murder each others bosses, with a little help from an eccentric ex-convict. Comedy, starring Jason Bateman, Charlie Day, Jason Sudeikis, Kevin Spacey, Jennifer Aniston and Colin Farrell

programme.title: Bad Teacher
programme.desc: Cynical, hard-drinking teacher Elizabeth Halsey hates her job and the kids in her class, and hopes to escape her daily grind by landing a rich husband. A wealthy substitute seems like a suitable candidate, but she has a rival for his attention in a squeaky-clean colleague. Comedy, starring Cameron Diaz, Justin Timberlake, Jason Segel and Lucy Punch

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Dim-witted friends Harry and Lloyd are reunited after 20 years. When Harry discovers he has a daughter he never knew about, he breaks his friend out of a psychiatric hospital and they go on a road trip with the intention of fulfilling parental responsibilities neither of them is capable of. Comedy sequel, starring Jim Carrey and Jeff Daniels

programme.title: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
programme.desc: Young courting couples Fred and Wilma, and Barney and Betty are invited to stay at a luxury casino in the Stone Age gambling capital. Owner Chip Rockefeller is bent on stopping Fred proposing to wealthy Wilma, because he wants to marry her himself for the money and settle his debts. Family comedy prequel, with Mark Addy, Stephen Baldwin, Joan Collins, Alan Cumming, Kristen Johnston and Jane Krakowski

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: A reporter discovers four humanoid amphibians who live in the sewers of New York, and use their martial arts skills to fight crime. She helps them as they face their toughest challenge yet - defeating a sinister criminal organisation that seems to have power over the entire city. Fantasy adventure, starring Megan Fox and William Fichtner, with the voice of Johnny Knoxville

programme.title: Big Fat Liar
programme.desc: A 14-year-old with a reputation for tall tales loses the sole copy of a story he has written for school - only for it to end up in the hands of a Hollywood producer. When the youngster realises it has been made into a blockbuster movie, he goes to Los Angeles with his best friend to claim a fair share of the profits - but when the movie executive refuses to do the right thing, they plan a fitting revenge. Comedy, with Frankie Muniz, Paul Giamatti and Amanda Bynes

programme.title: Johnny English
programme.desc: A bumbling secret agent becomes Britains leading spy following the assassination of all the countrys other espionage experts. Single-handedly he sets out to unmask a mysterious villain responsible for stealing the Crown Jewels - but no one is prepared to believe a sinister billionaire is the culprit. Comedy, starring Rowan Atkinson, John Malkovich, Natalie Imbruglia and Ben Miller

programme.title: Johnny English Reborn
programme.desc: A bumbling secret agent retires to a Tibetan monastery in disgrace after a mission goes wrong. He is lured out of seclusion by the chance to redeem himself when his former bosses seek his help in foiling an attempt to assassinate the premier of China. Spy comedy sequel, starring Rowan Atkinson, Gillian Anderson, Rosamund Pike and Dominic West

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Blue-collar caveman Fred Flintstone is promoted to an executive position at work and unwittingly becomes embroiled in an embezzlement scheme - thanks in no small part to his seductive new assistant. Live-action version of the cartoon comedy, starring John Goodman, Rick Moranis, Rosie ODonnell, Halle Berry and Elizabeth Taylor

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Life for identical twins Jared and Simon and their sister Mallory begins afresh when their mother inherits a spooky mansion. But after moving in, strange things begin to happen, and as the youngsters investigate, they discover a book that opens up a mysterious world of amazing supernatural creatures. Fantasy adventure, starring Freddie Highmore in a dual role alongside Sarah Bolger and Nick Nolte

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: Peter Pan, who has finally grown up and is now a married lawyer with a family of his own, is whisked away by Tinkerbell to Neverland, where he must learn to fly again if he is to save his children from the clutches of Captain Hook. Steven Spielbergs fantasy adventure, with Robin Williams, Dustin Hoffman, Julia Roberts, Bob Hoskins and Maggie Smith

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A hi-tech computer chip has a bizarre effect on a squad of toy soldiers, causing mayhem for their owner as the miniature marauders engage in a series of scaled-down skirmishes. Childrens adventure mixing live action and computer animation, starring Kirsten Dunst, Denis Leary and Gregory Smith, with the voices of Tommy Lee Jones, Frank Langella, Sarah Michelle Gellar and Christina Ricci

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: An obese, terminally shy professor invents a potion that transforms him into a slim, loud-mouthed charmer. His new streamlined self immediately sets out to woo the woman of his dreams - but soon starts to ride roughshod over everything he used to care about. Remake of the 1963 Jerry Lewis comedy, starring Eddie Murphy, Jada Pinkett Smith, James Coburn and Larry Miller

programme.title: The Three Musketeers: Milady
programme.desc: DArtagnan faces a race against time to rescue his kidnapped sweetheart, the queens seamstress and confidante Constance. The young womans survival may rest with Milady, compelling DArtagnan to forge an uneasy alliance with his former enemy. Meanwhile, King Louis XIII faces the prospect of civil war, fuelled by conspirators within his royal court. Swashbuckling sequel, starring François Civil, Eva Green and Vincent Cassel

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop 2
programme.desc: The bumbling security guard is invited to attend a conference in Las Vegas, and brings his teenage daughter along for a family holiday before she leaves for college. However, he is forced to leap into action when he uncovers a gang of criminals are plotting a casino heist. Comedy, starring Kevin James and Raini Rodriguez

programme.title: The Cinema List: Family Favourites
programme.desc: Discover some of the very best Sky Originals to watch with the whole family, from Monster Family to The Amazing Maurice

programme.title: Pups United
programme.desc: A childrens football team competes in a world championship, but one member is left off the field to look after the canine mascot. When an evil plot emerges to sabotage the tournament, the quick-witted dog assembles the other mascots into a team to foil the villains responsible. Family adventure, starring Matthew James Roberts and Kristin Carey, with the voice of Rob Schneider

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Life for identical twins Jared and Simon and their sister Mallory begins afresh when their mother inherits a spooky mansion. But after moving in, strange things begin to happen, and as the youngsters investigate, they discover a book that opens up a mysterious world of amazing supernatural creatures. Fantasy adventure, starring Freddie Highmore in a dual role alongside Sarah Bolger and Nick Nolte

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: Peter Pan, who has finally grown up and is now a married lawyer with a family of his own, is whisked away by Tinkerbell to Neverland, where he must learn to fly again if he is to save his children from the clutches of Captain Hook. Steven Spielbergs fantasy adventure, with Robin Williams, Dustin Hoffman, Julia Roberts, Bob Hoskins and Maggie Smith

programme.title: The Three Musketeers: Milady
programme.desc: DArtagnan faces a race against time to rescue his kidnapped sweetheart, the queens seamstress and confidante Constance. The young womans survival may rest with Milady, compelling DArtagnan to forge an uneasy alliance with his former enemy. Meanwhile, King Louis XIII faces the prospect of civil war, fuelled by conspirators within his royal court. Swashbuckling sequel, starring François Civil, Eva Green and Vincent Cassel

programme.title: Jackie Chans The Tuxedo
programme.desc: A bumbling chauffeur steps in to take the place of a secret agent injured in an explosion. Wearing the agents hi-tech suit, and with the help of a rookie spy, the humble driver now has all the power he needs to stop a villain from gaining global domination by polluting the worlds water supply. Comedy adventure, starring Jackie Chan, Jennifer Love Hewitt, Jason Isaacs and Richie Coster

programme.title: Journey to the Center of the Earth
programme.desc: Scientist Trevor Anderson sets out to locate his missing explorer brother after receiving a book charting his last journey. Accompanied by his nephew and an Icelandic guide, he is led to a mountain peak, where he stumbles across a system of caves leading to a lost underground world. Fantasy adventure, starring Brendan Fraser, Josh Hutcherson and Anita Briem

programme.title: Journey 2: The Mysterious Island
programme.desc: A teenager picks up a distress signal originating from the middle of the ocean. Joining an expedition to track the signal to its source, he discovers an unexplored island inhabited by strange creatures, and searches for a way to rescue its sole human inhabitant. Fantasy adventure sequel to Journey to the Centre of the Earth, starring Dwayne Johnson, Michael Caine and Josh Hutcherson

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The tiny blue forest-dwelling creatures flee from an evil wizard, only to end up magically transported to modern-day New York. They search for a way to get back to their own village while evading their enemy, who has followed them to the Big Apple. Fantasy comedy, with Neil Patrick Harris, Hank Azaria and Jayma Mays, plus voices of Jonathan Winters and Katy Perry

programme.title: The Smurfs 2
programme.desc: The tiny blue forest-dwelling creatures and their human friends go on a rescue mission to Paris. Their old foe Gargamel the evil wizard has created mischievous smurfs of his own and kidnapped Smurfette to learn the secret of her magic. Fantasy comedy sequel, starring Hank Azaria and Neil Patrick Harris, with the voices of Katy Perry and Christina Ricci

programme.title: The Secret Garden
programme.desc: When a young girl is sent to live with her uncle on his remote country estate after her parents die, she discovers a magical garden. Director Marc Mundens adaptation of the classic Frances Hodgson Burnett tale, starring Colin Firth, Julie Walters and Dixie Egerickx

programme.title: Pups United
programme.desc: A childrens football team competes in a world championship, but one member is left off the field to look after the canine mascot. When an evil plot emerges to sabotage the tournament, the quick-witted dog assembles the other mascots into a team to foil the villains responsible. Family adventure, starring Matthew James Roberts and Kristin Carey, with the voice of Rob Schneider

programme.title: Ride On
programme.desc: Lao Luo is a washed-up stuntman with a deformed horse called Red Hare, who he saved from euthanasia. The duo become overnight sensations when a fight with debt collectors goes viral. Writer/director Larry Yangs action drama, starring Jackie Chan, Liu Haocun and Kevin Guo. In Mandarin, with subtitles

programme.title: Antz
programme.desc: A neurotic worker ant passes himself off as a soldier to impress a princess. However, he provokes a jealously ambitious general with an accidental act of heroism - so he and his beloved decide to flee the brutal colony and go in search of the promised land of Insectopia. Animated comedy, with the voices of Woody Allen, Sharon Stone, Gene Hackman and Sylvester Stallone

programme.title: Jackie Chans The Tuxedo
programme.desc: A bumbling chauffeur steps in to take the place of a secret agent injured in an explosion. Wearing the agents hi-tech suit, and with the help of a rookie spy, the humble driver now has all the power he needs to stop a villain from gaining global domination by polluting the worlds water supply. Comedy adventure, starring Jackie Chan, Jennifer Love Hewitt, Jason Isaacs and Richie Coster

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: When New York University professor Rachel Chu heads to Singapore with her boyfriend, Nick Young, shes surprised to learn hes from an extremely wealthy family. The problem is they arent so approving of her, so she attempts to win them over. Blockbusting comedy based on Kevin Kwans novel, starring Constance Wu, Henry Golding, Gemma Chan and Michelle Yeoh

programme.title: Aeon Flux
programme.desc: Scientists create a futuristic police state, but political assassinations and corruption provoke an acrobatic rebel agent to seek revenge on those in charge. Sci-fi martial arts thriller, based on the animated series, with Charlize Theron, Marton Csokas, Frances McDormand, Jonny Lee Miller and Sophie Okonedo

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: A drifter in a post-apocalyptic wasteland encounters a crazed, sadistic warlord and his radiation-afflicted cult. He assists a warrior who has turned against the tyrant, and liberates five women who have been forced to become his brides. Together, they make a desperate journey through the desert to salvation, with their enemies in hot pursuit. Reboot of the sci-fi thriller franchise, starring Tom Hardy and Charlize Theron

programme.title: Charlies Angels
programme.desc: Three private investigators are recruited to rescue a computer genius from the clutches of a rival. They discover there is more at stake than they thought, as the captive genius has created a dangerous piece of software that must not fall into the wrong hands. Action adventure, based on the TV series, starring Cameron Diaz, Drew Barrymore, Lucy Liu and Bill Murray

programme.title: Charlies Angels: Full Throttle
programme.desc: The high-kicking trio return, this time to hunt down the villains responsible for stealing two encoded rings containing top-secret information. The case brings them into conflict with a former Angel gone bad, a spurned ex-lover out for revenge and their creepy old enemy the Thin Man. Action adventure sequel, starring Drew Barrymore, Cameron Diaz and Lucy Liu, with Demi Moore, John Cleese and Bernie Mac

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Ten interlinked stories of people searching for and finding love. While the newly elected, bachelor British prime minister is smitten by a junior staff member at 10 Downing Street, a heartbroken writer heads for France to get over a failed relationship, and a faded rock star aims to reinvent himself in time for Christmas. Richard Curtiss romantic comedy, with Hugh Grant, Martine McCutcheon, Emma Thompson, Alan Rickman, Colin Firth, Bill Nighy and Liam Neeson

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: A man is forced to witness the murder of his wife and daughter, and is driven to despair when one of the perpetrators walks free at trial. Years later, he begins a campaign of vigilante violence, seeking revenge on the killers and the justice system that failed to punish them, particularly an assistant district attorney who allowed the defendant to make a deal during the court proceedings. Thriller, with Gerard Butler and Jamie Foxx

programme.title: Gods of Egypt
programme.desc: An ancient Egyptian god is driven into exile when his evil brother murders their father and seizes his throne. He enlists the aid of a human thief in restoring justice, and in return offers to help the mortal to bring his murdered lover back to life. Fantasy adventure, starring Nikolaj Coster-Waldau, Brenton Thwaites, Gerard Butler and Chadwick Boseman

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: Death takes over the body of a recently deceased young man, and embarks on a mission to claim the life of a powerful media tycoon, but ends up falling in love with his daughter instead - leaving him on the horns of a dilemma. Remake of 1934 romantic fantasy Death Takes a Holiday, starring Brad Pitt, Anthony Hopkins and Claire Forlani

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winters War
programme.desc: Eric and fellow warrior Sara, raised as members of ice Queen Freyas army, try to conceal their forbidden love as they fight to survive the wicked intentions of both Freya and her sister Ravenna. However, as war between the siblings escalates, Eric and Sara unite with Freya in an attempt to end Ravennas wicked reign once and for all. Fantasy adventure, starring Chris Hemsworth, Charlize Theron, Emily Blunt and Jessica Chastain.

programme.title: The Fighting Temptations
programme.desc: A New York businessman is thrilled to hear his aunt has left him a considerable inheritance - but to get it, he must ensure the local gospel choir wins a forthcoming competition. Luckily, a few of the residents turn out to have a touch of talent, but he still faces a tough task pulling them into shape. Musical comedy, starring Cuba Gooding Jr, Beyonce Knowles, Melba Moore and Lou Myers

programme.title: The Birds
programme.desc: A San Francisco socialite takes a shine to a man she meets by chance, and follows him home to a Californian coastal community. Her arrival coincides with a series of mysterious attacks on people by birds, which soon escalates as vast flocks go on the warpath. Alfred Hitchcocks thriller, based on a Daphne du Maurier short story, starring Tippi Hedren, Rod Taylor, Suzanne Pleshette, Jessica Tandy and Veronica Cartwright

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: Death takes over the body of a recently deceased young man, and embarks on a mission to claim the life of a powerful media tycoon, but ends up falling in love with his daughter instead - leaving him on the horns of a dilemma. programme.title: Twisters
programme.desc: Meteorologist Kate Cooper crosses paths with social media star Tyler Owens. Standalone disaster sequel, starring Daisy Edgar-Jones and Glen Powell

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: The laid-back lifestyle of an arrogant New York playboy is shattered when his unstable girlfriend drives off a bridge with him in the car. Although he survives, he struggles to put his life back together in the face of a series of strange events. Cameron Crowes remake of Spanish thriller Open Your Eyes, starring Tom Cruise, Cameron Diaz, Kurt Russell, Jason Lee and Penelope Cruz, who also appeared in the original

programme.title: Footloose
programme.desc: A rebellious, hip-swinging student from the city moves to a small religious community, where he instantly clashes with an old-school fire-and-brimstone preacher - who has banned dancing and rock n roll because he considers them immoral. Drama, starring Kevin Bacon, Lori Singer, John Lithgow, Chris Penn, Dianne Wiest and Sarah Jessica Parker

programme.title: Hannibal
programme.desc: Fugitive serial killer Dr Hannibal Lecter has gone into hiding as an academic in Italy, but a disfigured victim is determined to find him and inflict a gruesome revenge. FBI agent Clarice Starling is once again drawn into the doctors deadly orbit as she finds herself being used as bait for the avengers trap. Ridley Scotts thriller sequel, starring Anthony Hopkins, Julianne Moore, Gary Oldman and Ray Liotta

programme.desc: Concerned about his girlfriends pregnancy, Ralphies life spirals when he meets a mysterious family. Writer/director John Trengoves thriller, starring Jesse Eisenberg, Adrien Brody and Odessa Young

programme.desc: An international action superstar gets involved in a rescue operation of a beloved zoo panda named Hu Hu. Chinese comedy, starring Jackie Chan and Xiang Wei, with subtitles

programme.desc: Two lovers find themselves central figures in a journey of battles and betrayal. Musical version of the classic tale, starring Clara Rugaard, Jamie Ward, Rebel Wilson and Jason Isaacs

programme.desc: Mina, a 28-year old artist, gets stranded in an expansive, untouched forest in western Ireland. When Mina finds shelter, she unknowingly becomes trapped alongside three strangers that are stalked by mysterious creatures each night. Horror, starring Dakota Fanning, Georgina Campbell and Olwen Fouere

programme.title: The Collector
programme.desc: A disturbed and reclusive butterfly collector decides to extend his collection of exquisite specimens and captures a beautiful art student to add to his menagerie. Thriller, based on John Fowles novel, starring Terence Stamp, Samantha Eggar, Mona Washbourne and Maurice Dallimore

programme.title: Speak No Evil
programme.desc: On holiday in Europe, American couple Ben and Louise Dalton and their anxiety-crippled daughter Agnes meet English doctor Patrick Feld, his wife Ciara and their young son Ant, who was born without a tongue. The Daltons vacation soon turns into a nightmare when they are invited to stay on the Felds country estate. Horror, starring James McAvoy, Mackenzie Davis, Scoot McNairy and Aisling Franciosi

programme.title: Insidious: Chapter 2
programme.desc: A couple previously tormented by paranormal activity discover their nightmares are not over. As more strange events occur, they turn to a group of paranormal investigators for help in uncovering the dark secrets that connect them to the spirit world. Horror sequel, starring Patrick Wilson, Rose Byrne and Barbara Hershey

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: Maverick film-maker Carl Denham and his cast and crew board a ship bound for a mysterious island - but when they arrive, a giant gorilla carries off their leading lady, Ann Darrow. As the crew makes its way through the teeming jungle to find her, the director concocts a dangerous scheme to capture the great ape and take it back to New York. Peter Jacksons remake of the fantasy adventure, starring Naomi Watts, Jack Black, Adrien Brody and Andy Serkis, in a dual role as the ships cook and motion-captured creature

programme.title: The Woman in Black: Angel of Death
programme.desc: A group of evacuees and their teachers hope to find peace by escaping the nightly air raids on London at the remote Eel Marsh House. What they do not realise is that its malevolent ghost is still in residence and is out for blood. Horror sequel set during the Second World War, starring Helen McCrory, Jeremy Irvine and Phoebe Fox

programme.title: Edge of Tomorrow
programme.desc: An inexperienced military officer is sent to the front line in a war against an alien invasion, and dies within minutes. However, at the point of death, he is transported back in time to relive his last day again. As he faces the same battle over and over again, the experience he gains turns him into the ultimate warrior. Sci-fi adventure based on Hiroshi Sakurazakas novel All You Need Is Kill, starring Tom Cruise, Emily Blunt and Brendan Gleeson

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: A brilliant scientist tests an invisibility serum on himself, but becomes dangerously intoxicated by the power he acquires. He abandons his morals and heads out into the city to take full advantage of his condition. Realising he has been up to no good, concerned colleagues decide to confront him - with terrible consequences. Paul Verhoevens sci-fi thriller, starring Kevin Bacon, Elisabeth Shue, Josh Brolin and Kim Dickens

programme.title: Abigail
programme.desc: Six strangers are recruited to abduct 12-year-old Abigail from her family home and spirit the youngster to a remote location, Wilhelm Manor. They must hold her hostage for 24 hours to earn a huge ransom. However, the cash-hungry sextet are unaware that their captive is a vampire. Horror, starring Melissa Barrera, Dan Stevens, Alisha Weir and Kathryn Newton

programme.title: MaXXXine
programme.desc: In 1980s Hollywood, adult film star and aspiring actress Maxine Minx finally gets her big break. But as a mysterious killer stalks the starlets of Tinseltown, a trail of blood threatens to reveal her sinister past. The third instalment of director Ti Wests acclaimed X film series, starring Mia Goth, Lily Collins, Giancarlo Esposito and Kevin Bacon

programme.title: Cuckoo
programme.desc: A 17-year-old moves with her family to a resort where things are not what they seem. Writer/director Tilman Slingers horror thriller, starring Hunter Schafer, Jan Bluthardt and Dan Stevens

programme.title: Afraid
programme.desc: Computer engineering company executive Curtis is coerced into testing a new digital assistant named AIA to secure a lucrative business contract with two tech geniuses. At first, the omnipresent artificial intelligence simplifies day-to-day life. However, AIA becomes dangerously protective of the clan. Writer/director Chris Weitzs sci-fi horror, starring John Cho, Katherine Waterston and Keith Carradine

programme.title: The Woman in Black: Angel of Death

programme.desc: A scientists ill-advised experiments with virtual reality equipment transform a mentally handicapped gardener into a computer-enhanced megalomaniac with the power to make his dreams of world domination come true. Sci-fi thriller, starring Pierce Brosnan, Jeff Fahey, Jenny Wright, Geoffrey Lewis and Austin OBrien

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: A writer moves into a house where several people died years previously, but keeps the buildings dark history a secret from his family. While researching a book on the incident, he discovers a series of old cine films of the deaths, but as he watches them, he uncovers a supernatural force behind the tragedy. Horror, starring Ethan Hawke and Juliet Rylance

programme.title: Ouija
programme.desc: A teenager recovering from the suicide of a friend persuades a group of her classmates to join her in attempting to make contact with the dead girls spirit. They discover that she was driven to her death by dangerous supernatural forces, which they have unwittingly unleashed to prey on them. Horror, starring Olivia Cooke and Ana Coto

programme.title: Ouija: Origin of Evil
programme.desc: In 1967 Los Angeles, a widowed mother and her two daughters add a new stunt to boost their seance scam business. However, they get more than they bargained for when they invite an evil presence into their home. Supernatural horror prequel, starring Elizabeth Reaser and Annalise Basso

programme.title: Insidious
programme.desc: A family experience strange events in their house and become convinced it is haunted. However, after moving on, they find the dark forces have followed them and when their son mysteriously falls into a coma, they must find a way to get rid of the paranormal entities tormenting them. Horror, starring Patrick Wilson and Rose Byrne

programme.title: Insidious: Chapter 2
programme.desc: A couple previously tormented by paranormal activity discover their nightmares are not over. As more strange events occur, they turn to a group of paranormal investigators for help in uncovering the dark secrets that connect them to the spirit world. Horror sequel, starring Patrick Wilson, Rose Byrne and Barbara Hershey

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: A deep-space salvage crew investigate mysterious events aboard a hi-tech spaceship, which suddenly reappeared in orbit around Neptune after going missing for seven years - but it is not long before they are exposed to terror beyond their wildest nightmares. Sci-fi horror, starring Laurence Fishburne, Sam Neill, Kathleen Quinlan, Joely Richardson and Sean Pertwee

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part 2
programme.desc: A gang of foolhardy teenagers head for idyllic Crystal Lake with all manner of shenanigans in mind. But before they can get up to anything, a grotesque madman begins bumping them off in increasingly grisly fashion. Horror sequel, starring Amy Steel and John Furey and Warrington Gillette

programme.title: American Star
programme.desc: Out to kill a man he has never met, Wilson, a seasoned assassin completing his final assignment in Fuerteventura, is drawn to a ghostly shipwreck. Thriller, starring Ian McShane, Nora Arnezeder and Fanny Ardant

programme.title: Cult Killer
programme.desc: After a private investigator is murdered, his protege discovers the grisly secrets of their town. Difrector Jon Keeyes thriller, starring Antonio Banderas, Alice Eve and Shelley Hennig

programme.title: The Beekeeper
programme.desc: An apparently unassuming man finds someone very important to him has been scammed and driven to harm. Revealed as a former operative of a powerful and clandestine organisation known as Beekeepers, he sets out on a brutal quest of vengeance, hunting those responsible for the incident, who have seriously underestimated how much of a threat he is. Action thriller, starring Jason Statham, Jeremy Irons, Minnie Driver and Jemma Redgrave

programme.title: Trap
programme.desc: A serial killer attempts to evade a police blockade while attending a concert with his daughter. Thriller, starring Josh Hartnett, Ariel Donoghue, Saleka Shyamalan and Hayley Mills

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: Four magicians use their lavish stage shows as cover for a series of seemingly impossible heists, and give away the money they steal to their audiences. An FBI agent assembles a team of experts to discover how the baffling robberies are committed and what the secret agenda behind the crime spree is. Crime thriller, starring Jesse Eisenberg, Mark Ruffalo, Woody Harrelson and Isla Fisher

programme.title: Some Other Woman
programme.desc: While visiting an island for her husbands work, a woman meets a stranger who takes over her life. Thriller, starring Ashley Greene, Brooke Lyons and Tom Felton. Directed by Joel David Moore, better known as one of the stars of the Avatar films

programme.title: Patriot Games
programme.desc: Former CIA agent Jack Ryan foils an assassination attempt by an IRA splinter group, killing one of the terrorists in the process. However, he becomes caught in a lethal game of cat-and-mouse with the dead mans revenge-seeking brother. Thriller based on Tom Clancys novel, starring Harrison Ford, Sean Bean, Samuel L Jackson, Richard Harris and James Earl Jones, reprising his role from earlier Clancy adaptation The Hunt for Red October

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A former army sniper is arrested following a random shooting that leaves five people dead, but protests his innocence. An elusive former military police investigator is called in to examine the case, and becomes convinced a conspiracy is at work. Action thriller based on Lee Childs novel One Shot, starring Tom Cruise, Rosamund Pike, Werner Herzog and Robert Duvall

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: The nomadic vigilante tries to save an army major who has been framed for murder and treason. Jack Reacher discovers that Turner has been targeted by a secret government conspiracy, and together they go on the run to expose the truth. Director Edward Zwicks blockbusting action thriller sequel based on Lee Childs novel, starring Tom Cruise, Cobie Smulders, Danika Yarosh and Aldis Hodge

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: Three brothers run an underground bootlegging operation in Depression-era Virginia. However, as their criminal activities become increasingly successful, a corrupt deputy sheriff demands a cut of the profits, forcing them to fight to defend their livelihood. Crime drama, starring Shia LaBeouf, Tom Hardy, Jason Clarke, Gary Oldman and Guy Pearce

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: A man is forced to witness the murder of his wife and daughter, and is driven to despair when one of the perpetrators walks free at trial. Years later, he begins a campaign of vigilante violence, seeking revenge on the killers and the justice system that failed to punish them, particularly an assistant district attorney who allowed the defendant to make a deal during the court proceedings. Thriller, with Gerard Butler and Jamie Foxx

programme.title: The Surfer
programme.desc: A father returns to Australia to buy his childhood home. To celebrate, he takes his teenage son to Luna Bay so they can surf together. However, he becomes locked in a battle of one-upmanship with local thugs. Thriller, starring Nicolas Cage and Julian McMahon

programme.title: Ruthless

Thriller prequel to Kiss the Girls, starring Morgan Freeman, Monica Potter, Michael Wincott, Dylan Baker and Penelope Ann Miller

American comedy, starring Sarah Jessica Parker, Cynthia Nixon, Kim Cattrall and Kristin Davis

The .81-year-old Former Cincinnati Reds star recounts his unlikely rise and reignites his quest for reinstatement in Major League Baseball more than three decades after lifetime ban for gambling

programme.title: Discovering Film
programme.desc: A profile of the American actor, whose films include Thelma and Louise, Seven, Fight Club and 12 Monkeys, and won an Oscar for his role in Once Upon a Time in Hollywood

programme.title: The 2000s
programme.sub-title: The Platinum Age of Television - Part One
programme.desc: Documentary examining the cultural and political milestones of the decade, beginning with a look at its groundbreaking TV shows, including The Sopranos and Breaking Bad

programme.title: The Civil War
programme.desc: How the American Civil War became a crusade to end slavery. The year 1862 saw political fighting threaten President Lincolns administration and Union general George McClellans ill-fated campaign on the Virginia Peninsula, where his huge army met a smaller but more resourceful Confederate force. Eventually, rumours began to circulate that Europe was prepared to recognise the Confederacy

programme.title: Lockerbie
programme.desc: Investigators uncover a key piece of forensic evidence in the form of a fragment of a Toshiba radio that points to an Iran-backed Palestinian terror cell

programme.title: Lancaster
programme.desc: The story of the legendary bomber synonymous with the Dambusters, the night raids against Germany and the brave men and women who made them possible

programme.title: The Fog of War
programme.desc: Former US Secretary of Defense Robert McNamara looks back over his career, explaining why, after initially supporting the decision to go to war in Vietnam, he eventually chose to speak out against the conflict - a decision that cost him his position. Documentary by acclaimed film-maker Errol Morris

programme.title: The Truth vs Alex Jones
programme.desc: Following the two defamation lawsuits brought by families of Sandy Hook Elementary School shooting victims against Alex Jones and his website InfoWars

programme.title: The Great Horsemeat Scandal
programme.desc: A look at the major news story that broke in 2013, when it was found that meat unfit for human consumption had been smuggled into the human food chain and turned into cheap frozen meals for companies including Aldi, Tesco, Lidl and Burger King. With testimonies from whistleblowers, detectives and activists

programme.title: Seen and Heard: The History of Black Television
programme.desc: Part one of two. Documentary exploring African-American representation in Hollywood and TV, showcasing the creators and artists who shaped it. From Amos n Andy to The Jeffersons and Good Times, black representation was historically shaped by white writers and creators, but in the 1990s, a rise in shows made by black people brought social issues to the forefront

programme.title: Between the World and Me
programme.desc: Poetic adaptation of Ta-Nehisi Coates bestseller, recounting the authors experiences growing up in Baltimores inner city and his fear of violence against the Black community

programme.sub-title: The Stone Ball, the Electrocution Belt and the Cat Mummy That Wasnt
programme.desc: Hidden away in museums, laboratories and storage rooms around the world are the most remarkable and mysterious objects on earth. programme.desc: A trip to Harvard Universitys Warren Anatomical Museum, where in a display case is one of the most astonishing objects in medical science - the shattered skull of a 19th-century American railway worker

programme.desc: Veterans and historians tell the story of the Thai-Burma railway and the countless prisoners of war and slave labourers who died building it
